GE07bhg4c13u:2: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:3: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c13u:5: bhaktānām aham uddhartā saṃsārād ity avādi yat |
GE07bhg4c13u:8: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha [Gītā 12.7] iti pūrvaṃ pratijñātam |
GE07bhg4c13u:9: na cātma-jñānaṃ vinā saṃsārād uddharaṇaṃ sambhavatīti tattva-jñānopadeśārthaṃ prakṛti-puruṣa-vivekādhyāya ārabhyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:10: tatra yat saptame 'dhyāye aparā parā ceti prakṛti-dvayam uktaṃ tayor avivekāj jīva-bhāvam āpannasya cid-aṃśasyāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:11: yābhyāṃ ca jīvopabhogārtham īśvarasya sṛṣṭy-ādiṣu pravṛttiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:12: tad eva prakṛti-dvayaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-śabda-vācyaṃ parasparaṃ viviktaṃ tattvato nirūpayiṣyan bhagavān uvāca idam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:13: idaṃ bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetram ity abhidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:15: etad yo vetti ahaṃ mameti manyate taṃ kṣetrajña iti prāhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:21: jyotiḥ kiṃcana yogino yadi paraṃ paśyanti paśyantu te |
GE07bhg4c13u:22: asmākaṃ tu tad eva locana-camatkārāya bhūyāc ciraṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:23: kālindī-pulineṣu yat kim api tan nīlaṃ maho dhāvati ||
GE07bhg4c13u:24: prathama-madhyama-ṣaṭkayos tat-tvaṃ-padārthāv uktāv uttaras tu ṣaṭko vākyārtha-niṣṭhaḥ samyag-dhī-pradhāno 'dhunārabhyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:25: tatra - teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarād bhavāmi [Gītā 12.7] iti prāg uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:26: na cātma-jñāna-lakṣaṇān mṛtyor ātma-jñānaṃ vinoddharaṇaṃ sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:27: ato yādṛśenātma-jñānena mṛtyu-saṃsāra-nivṛttir yena ca tattva-jñānena yuktā adveṣṭṛtvādi-guṇa-śālinaḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ prāgvyākhyātās tadātma-tattva-jñānaṃ vaktavyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:28: tac cādvitīyena paramātmanā saha jīvasyābhedam eva viṣayīkaroti |
GE07bhg4c13u:30_0: tatra jīvānāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ pratikṣetraṃ bhinnānām asaṃsāriṇaikena paramātmanā katham
GE07bhg4c13u:30_1: abhedaḥ syād ity āśaṅkāyāṃ saṃsārasya bhinnatvasya cāvidyā-kalpitānātma-dharmatvān
GE07bhg4c13u:30_2: na jīvasya saṃsāritvaṃ bhinnatvaṃ ceti vacanīyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:31: tad arthaṃ dehendriyāntaḥ-karaṇebhyaḥ kṣetrebhyo vivekena kṣetrajñaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ pratikṣetram eka eva nirvikāra iti pratipādanāya kṣetra-kṣetrajña-vivekaḥ kriyate 'sminn adhyāye |
GE07bhg4c13u:32: tatra ye dve prakṛtī bhūmy-ādi-kṣetra-rūpatayā jīva-rūpa-kṣetrajñatayā cāpara-para-śabda-vācye sūcite tad-vivekena tattvaṃ nirūpayiṣyan śrī-bhagavān uvāca idaṃ śarīram iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:33: idam indriyāntaḥ-karaṇa-sahitaṃ bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ he kaunteya ! kṣetram ity abhidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:35: etad yo vetti ahaṃ mamety abhimanyate taṃ kṣetrajña iti prāhuḥ kṛṣībalavat tat-phala-bhoktṛtvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:37_0: atra cābhidhīyata iti karmaṇi prayogeṇa kṣetrasya jaḍatvāt karmatvaṃ kṣetrajña-śabde
GE07bhg4c13u:37_1: ca dvityāṃ vinaveti-śabdam āharan svaprakāśatvāt karmatvābhāvam avivekina evāhuḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:37_2: sthūla-dṛśām agocaratvād iti kathayituṃ vilakṣaṇa-vacana-vyaktyaikatra kartṛ-padopādānena
GE07bhg4c13u:40: jñānādiṣv api tiṣṭhet tat sārthakī-karaṇā yayā ||
GE07bhg4c13u:42: tan-madhye kevalā bhaktir api bhaṅgyā prakṛṣyate ||
GE07bhg4c13u:44: jñānasya sādhanaṃ jīvaḥ prakṛtiś ca viśiṣyate ||
GE07bhg4c13u:45: tad evaṃ dvitīyena ṣaṭkena kevalayā bhaktyā bhagavat-prāptiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:47_0: atha prathama-ṣatkoditānāṃ niṣkāmakarma-yogināṃ bhakti-miśra-jñāṇād eva mokṣas tac
GE07bhg4c13u:47_1: ca jñānaṃ saṅkṣepād uktam api punaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajñādi-vivecanena vivarituṃ tṛitīyaṃ ṣaṭkam ārabhate ||
GE07bhg4c13u:48: tatra kiṃ kṣetraṃ kaḥ kṣetrajña ity apekṣāyām āha idam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:49: idaṃ sendriyaṃ bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetraṃ saṃsārasya praroha-bhūmitvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:50: tad yo vetti bandha-daśāyām ahaṃ-mamety abhimanyamānaṃ sva-sambandhitvenaiva jānāti,
GE07bhg4c13u:52: tam ubhayāvasthaṃ jīvaṃ kṣetrajñam iti prāhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:53: kṛṣībalavat sa eva kṣetrajñas tat-phala-bhoktā ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:58: māyāmayaṃ veda sa veda vedam || iti | [BhP 11.12.23]
GE07bhg4c13u:59: asyārthaḥ gṛdhnantīti gṛdhrā grāmecarā baddha-jīvā asya vṛkṣasyakaṃ phalaṃ duḥkham adanti,
GE07bhg4c13u:61: araṇya-vāsā haṃsā mukta-jīvā eka-phalaṃ sukham adanti,
GE07bhg4c13u:63: evam ekam api saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ bahuvidha-naraka-svargāpavarga-prāpakatvād bahu-rūpaṃ māyā-śakti-samudbhūtatvān māyāmayam |
GE07bhg4c13u:64: ijyaiḥ pūjyair gurubhiḥ kṛtvā yo vedeti tad-vidaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor veditāraḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c13u:68: bhaktau pūrvopadiṣṭāyāṃ jñānaṃ dvāraṃ bhavaty ataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:71: madhya-ṣatke tu bhakti-śabditaṃ paramātmopāsanaṃ tan-mahima-nigada-pūrvakam upadiṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c13u:72: tac ca kevalaṃ tad-vaśyatākaraṃ sat tat-prāpakam |
GE07bhg4c13u:73: ārtādīnāṃ tu tam upāsīnānām ārti-vināśādi-karaṃ tad-ekānti-prasaṅgena kevalaṃ sat tat-prāpakaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:74: yogena jñānena copasṛṣṭaṃ tv aiśvarya-pradhāna-tad-rūpopalambhakaṃ mocakaṃ cety uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:75: tathāsminn antya-ṣatke prakṛti-puruṣa-tat-saṃyoga-hetuka-jagat tad-īśvara-svarūpāṇi karma-jñāna-bhakti-svarūpāṇi ca vivicyante |
GE07bhg4c13u:76: jñāna-vaiśadyāya etāvat trayogaśe 'sminn adhyāye deha-jīva-pareśa-svarūpāṇi vivecanīyāni |
GE07bhg4c13u:77: dehādi-viviktasyāpi jīvātmano deha-sambandha-hetus tad-vivekānusandhi-prakāraś ca vimarśanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:78: tad idam arthajātam abhidhātuṃ bhagavān uvāca idam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:79: he kaunteya idaṃ sendriya-prāṇaṃ śarīraṃ bhoktur jīvasya bhogya-sukha-duḥkhādi-prarohakatvāt kṣetram ity abhidhīyate tattva-jñaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:80: etac charīraṃ devo 'haṃ mānavo 'haṃ sthūlo 'ham ity ajñair ātma-bhedena pratīyamānam api yaḥ śayyāsanādivad-ātmano bhannam ātma-bhoga-mokṣa-sādhanaṃ ca vetti,
GE07bhg4c13u:82: tad-veditṛtayā bhinnaṃ tad-vidaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-svarūpa-jñāḥ kṣetrajñam iti prāhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:87: māyā-mayaṃ veda sa veda vedam || iti | [BhP 11.12.23]
GE07bhg4c13u:88: śarīrātmavādī tu kṣetrajño na, kṣetratvema taj-jñānābhāvāt ||1||
GE07bhg4c13u:91: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarva-kṣetreṣu bhārata |
GE07bhg4c13u:92: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama ||2||
GE07bhg4c13u:93: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ saṃsāriṇaḥ svarūpam uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:94: idānīṃ tasyaiva pāramārthikam asaṃsāri-svarūpam āha kṣetrajñam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:95: ta ca kṣetrajñaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ jīvaṃ vastutaḥ sarva-kṣetreṣv anugataṃ mām eva viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:96: tattvam asi iti śrutyā lakṣitena cid-aṃśena mad-rūpasyoktatvāt ādarārtham eva taj-jñānaṃ stauti |
GE07bhg4c13u:97: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yad evaṃ vailakṣaṇeyan jñānaṃ tad eva mokṣa-hetutvān mama jñanaṃ matam |
GE07bhg4c13u:105: evaṃ dehendriyādi-vilakṣaṇaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ kṣetrajñam abhidhāya tasya pāramārthikaṃ tattvam asaṃsāri-paramātmanaikyam āha kṣetrajñam apīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:106_0: sarva-kṣetreṣu ya ekaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ svaprakāśa-caitanya-rūpo nityo vibhuś ca tam avidyādhyāropita-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvādi-saṃsāra-dharmaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:106_1: kṣetrajñam avidyaka-rūpa-parityāgena mām īśvaram asaṃsāriṇam advitīya-brahmānanda-rūpaṃ viddhi jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:107: he bhārata ! evaṃ ca kṣetraṃ māyā-kalpitaṃ mithyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:108_0: kṣetrajñaś ca paramārtha-satyas tad-bhramādhiṣṭhānam iti kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yaj
GE07bhg4c13u:108_1: jñānaṃ tad eva mokṣa-sādhanatvāj jñānam avidyā-virodhi-prakāśa-rūpaṃ mama matam anyat
GE07bhg4c13u:108_2: tv ajñānam eva tad-virodhitvād ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:109: atra jīveśvarayor āvidyako bhedaḥ pāramārthikas tv abheda ity atra yuktayo bhāṣya-kṛdbhir varṇitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:110: asmābhis tu grantha-vistara-bhayāt prāg eva bahudhoktatvāc ca nopanyastāḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c13u:111: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ kṣetra-jñānāt jīvātmanaḥ kṣetrajñatvam uktam,
GE07bhg4c13u:112: paramātmanas tu tato 'pi kārtsnyena sarva-kṣetrajñatvāt kṣetrajñatvam āha kṣetrajñam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:113: sarva-kṣetreṣu niyantṛtvena sthitaṃ māṃ paramātmānaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:114: jīvānāṃ pratyekam akaika-kṣetra-jñnānāṃ tad api na kṛtsnam |
GE07bhg4c13u:115: mama tv ekasyaiva sarva-kṣetrajñatvaṃ kṛtsnam eveti viśeṣo jñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:116: kiṃ jñānam ity apekṣāyām āha kṣetreṇa saha kṣetrajñayor jīvātma-paramātanor yaj jñānaṃ kṣetra-jīvātma-paramātmanāṃ yaj jñānam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:117: tad eva jñānaṃ mama mataṃ sammataṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:120: atha paramātmanas tad āha kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi mām iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:121: he bhārat sarva-kṣetreṣu māṃ ca kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:123: jīvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ kṣetraṃ svabhoga-mokṣa-sādhanaṃ jānantaḥ kṣetrajñāḥ prajāvat |
GE07bhg4c13u:124: ahaṃ tu sarveśvara eka eva sarvāṇi tāni bhartavyāni ca jānan tat-sarva-kṣetrajño rājavad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:129: tataḥ kṣetrajña ucyate || ity ādi smṛtibhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:130: kiṃ jñānam ity apekṣāyām āha kṣetreti |
GE07bhg4c13u:132: tat-sahitayos tayor mitho vivekena yaj-jñānaṃ tad eva jñānaṃ mama matam |
GE07bhg4c13u:134_1: mithaḥ-sampṛktānām api teṣāṃ na tat tad-dharma-sāṅkaryaṃ citrāmbara-rūpavad ity evam
GE07bhg4c13u:134_2: āha sūtrakāraḥ -- na tu dṛṣṭānta-bhāvāt iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:149_0: atrāpi kṣarākṣara-śabda-bodhyāt kṣetra-kṣetrajña-rūpād yugalāt svasya puruṣottamasyānyatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:149_1: vakṣyati dvāv imau puruṣau ity ādibhis tasmān mithaḥ sampṛktānām api prakṛty-ādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:150: yat tv ekātma-vādinaḥ kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi ity atra sāmānādhikaraṇya-pratītyā sarveśvarasyaiva sato 'syā vidyayaiva kṣetrajña-bhāvo rajjor iva bhujaṅgamatvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:151_0: tan-nivṛttaye harer āptatamasyedaṃ vākyaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi mām iti rajjur iyaṃ na
GE07bhg4c13u:151_1: bhujaṅga ity āpta-vākyād bhujaṅgatva-bhrāntir iva kṣetrajñatva-bhrāntir asmād vākyād
GE07bhg4c13u:151_2: vinaśyatīty āhus tat kilopadeśyāsambhavād eva nirastam iti dehino 'smin ity asya bhāṣye draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:154: kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ ca mām eva viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:157: tayor mad-adhīna-pravṛttikatvādibhir mad-ātmakatayā yaj-jñānaṃ taj jñānaṃ mama matam ito 'nyathā tv amatam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:160: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yad-vikāri yataś ca yat |
GE07bhg4c13u:161: sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu ||3||
GE07bhg4c13u:163: tatra yady api caturviṃśatyā bhedair bhinnā prakṛtiḥ kṣetram ity ābhipretaṃ tathāpi deha-rūpeṇa pariṇatāyām eva tasyām ahaṃ-bhāvena avivekaḥ sphuṭa iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:164: tad-vivekārtham idaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetram ity ādy uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:165: tad etat prapañcayiṣyan pratijānīte tad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:166: yad uktaṃ mayā kṣetraṃ tat kṣetraṃ yat svarūpato jaḍaṃ dṛśyādi-svabhāvām |
GE07bhg4c13u:170: yad iti yaiḥ prakāraiḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamādi-bhedaiḥ, bhinnam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:171: sa ca kṣetrajño yat-svarūpo yat-prabhāvaś ca acintyaiśvarya-yogena yaiḥ prabhāvaiḥ sampannaḥ taṃ sarvaṃ saṅkṣepeto mattaḥ śṛṇu ||3||
GE07bhg4c13u:172: madhusūdanaḥ : saṃkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ vivarītum ārabhate tat kṣetram iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:173: tad idaṃ śarīram iti prāg uktaṃ jaḍa-varga-rūpaṃ kṣetraṃ yac ca svarūpeṇa jaḍa-dṛśya-paricchinnādi-svabhāvaṃ yādṛk cecchādi-dharmakaṃ yad-vikāri yair indriyādi-vikārair yuktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:174: yataś ca kāraṇād yat kāryam utpadyata iti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:176: yad iti yaiḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamādi-bhedair bhinnam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:178: sa ca kṣetrajñayor yaḥ svarūpataḥ sva-prakāśa-caitanyānanda-svabhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:179: yat-prabhāvaś ca ye prabhāvā upādhi-kṛtāḥ śaktayo yasya tat-kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyaṃ sarva-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭaṃ samāsena saṃkṣepeṇa me mama vacanāc chṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c13u:182: saṅkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ vivaritum ārabhate tat kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ yac ca mahābhūta-prāṇendriyādi-saṅghāta-rūpam |
GE07bhg4c13u:186: yad iti yaiḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamādi-bhedair bhinnam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:188: yat tad iti napuṃsakam anapuṃsakennaikavac ceti eka-śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:190: baladevaḥ : saṅkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ viśadayitum āha tad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:191: tat kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ yac ca yad dravyaṃ yādṛk yad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ yad-vikāri yair vikārair upetaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:192: yataś ca hetor udbhūtaṃ yat prayojanakaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:194: sa ca kṣetrajño jīva-lakṣaṇaḥ pareśa-lakṣaṇaś ca yo yat svarūpo ya-prabhāvo yac-chaktikaś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:198: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak |
GE07bhg4c13u:200: śrīdharaḥ : kair vistareṇoktasyāyaṃ saṅkṣepa ity apekṣāyām āha ṛṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:202: yoga-śāstreṣu dhyāna-dhāraṇādi-viṣayatvena virājādirūpeṇa bahudhā gītaṃ nirūpitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:207: brahma sūtryate sūcyate ebhir iti brahma-sūtrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c13u:208: yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante [TaittU 3.1.1] ity ādīni taṭastha-lakṣaṇa-parāṇy upaniṣad-vākyāni |
GE07bhg4c13u:209: tathā ca brahma padyate gamyate sākṣāj jñāyata ebhir iti padāni svarūpa-lakṣaṇa-parāṇi satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma ity ādīni |
GE07bhg4c13u:211: kiṃ ca hetumadbhiḥ sad eva saumyedam agra āsīt katham asataḥ saj jāyeta [Chā 6.2.1] iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:213: kaḥ prāṇyāt yad eṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt eṣa hy evānandayati [TaittU 2.7.1] ity ādi yuktimadbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:215: prāṇyāt prāṇa-vyāpāraṃ vā kaḥ kuryāt iti śruti-padayor arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:217: tad evam etair vistareṇoktaṃ duḥsaṅgrahaṃ saṅkṣepatas tubhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c13u:219: yad vā athāto brahma-jijñāsā [Vs. 1.1.1] ity ādīni brahma-sūtrāṇi gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c13u:220: tāny eva brahma padyate niścīyate ebhir iti padāni |
GE07bhg4c13u:222: ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt [Vs 1.1.13] ity ādibhir yuktimadbhir viniścitair ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:225: kair vistareṇoktasyāyaṃ saṃkṣepa ity apekṣāyāṃ śrotṛ-buddhi-prarocanārthaṃ stuvann āha ṛṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:226: ṛṣibhir vasiṣṭhādibhir yoga-śāstreṣu dhāraṇā-dhyāna-viṣayatvena bahudhā gītaṃ nirūpitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:228: vividhair nitya-naimittika-kāmya-karmādi-viṣayaiś chandobhir ṛg-ādi-mantrair brāhmaṇaiś ca pṛthag vivekato gītam |
GE07bhg4c13u:230: brahma-sūtra-padaiś ca brahma sūtryate sūcyate kiṃcid vyavadhānena pratipādyata ebhir iti brahma-sūtrāṇi -- yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c13u:233: [TaittU 3.1.1] ity ādīni taṭastha-lakṣaṇa-parāṇy upaniṣad-vākyāni tathā padyate brahma sākṣāt pratipādyata ebhir iti padāni svarūpa-lakṣaṇa-parāṇi satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c13u:234: ity ādīni tair brahma-sūtraiḥ padaiś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:235_0: hetumadbhiḥ -- sad eva saumyedam agra āsīd.. ekam evādvitīyam [Chā 6.2.1] ity upakramya
GE07bhg4c13u:235_1: tad dhaika āhur asad evedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyaṃ tasmād asataḥ saj jāyate iti
GE07bhg4c13u:235_2: nāstika-matam upanyasya kutas tu khalu somyaivaṃ syād iti hovāca katham asataḥ saj
GE07bhg4c13u:235_3: jāyate ity ādi-yuktīḥ pratipādayadbhir viniścitair upakramopasaṃhāraika-vākyatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:237: evam etair ativastareṇoktaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa tubhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:238: athavā brahma-sūtrāṇi tāni padāni ceti karma-dhārayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:239: tatra vidyā-sūtrāṇi ātmety evopāsīta ity ādīni avidyā-sūtrāṇi na sa veda yathā paśuḥ ity ādīni tair gītam iti ||4||
GE07bhg4c13u:241: kair vistareṇoktasyāyaṃ saṅkṣepa ity apekṣāyām āha ṛṣibhir vaśiṣṭhādibhir yoga-śāstreṣu |
GE07bhg4c13u:243: brahma-sūtrāṇi athāto brahma-jijñāsā [Vs. 1.1.1] ity ādīni tāny eva sūtrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c13u:244: brahma padyate jñāyate ebhir iti tāni |
GE07bhg4c13u:247: ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt [Vs. 1.1.13] iti yuktimadbhir viniścitair viśeṣato niścitārthaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:249: idaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyaṃ kair vistareṇoktaṃ yat samāsena brūṣa ity apekṣāyām āha ṛṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:250: ṛṣibhiḥ parāśarādibhir etat kṣetrādi-svarūpaṃ bahudhā gītam -
GE07bhg4c13u:251: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye bhūtair uhyāma pārthiva |
GE07bhg4c13u:253: karma-vaśyā guṇā hy ete sattvādyāḥ pṛthivī-pate |
GE07bhg4c13u:255: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:258_0: tathā chandobhir vedair vividhair sarvair bahudhā tad gītaṃ yajuḥ-śākhāyāṃ tasmād
GE07bhg4c13u:258_1: vā etasmād ātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ [TaittU 2.1.3] ity ādinā brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā
GE07bhg4c13u:258_3: puruṣāḥ paṭhitās teṣv anna-mayādi-trayaṃ jaḍaṃ kṣetra-svarūpaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:259: tato bhinno vijñāna-mayo jīvas tasya bhokteti jīva-kṣetrajña-svarūpaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:260: tasmāc ca bhinnaḥ sarvāntara ānanda-maya itīśvara-kṣetrajña-svarūpam uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:262: brahma-sūtra-rūpaiḥ padair vākyaiś ca tad-yāthātmyaṃ gītam |
GE07bhg4c13u:263: teṣu na viyad aśruteḥ [Vs. 2.3.1] ity ādinā kṣetra-svarūpaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:265: parāt tu tac chruteḥ [Vs. 2.3.39] ity ādineśvara-svarūpam | sphuṭam anyat ||
GE07bhg4c13u:268: mahā-bhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:270: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:272: śrīdharaḥ : tatra kṣetra-svarūpam āha mahābhūtānīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:279: indriya-goccarāś ca pañca tan-mātra-rūpā eva śabdādaya ākāśādi-viśeṣa-guṇatayā vyaktāḥ santa indriya-viṣayāḥ pañca tad evaṃ caturviṃśati-tattvāni uktāni ||5||
GE07bhg4c13u:285: ete ceddhādayo dṛśyatvān nātma-dharmāḥ, api tu mano-dharmā eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:288: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva [BAU 1.5.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:289: anena ca yādṛg iti pratijñātāḥ kṣetra-dharmā darśitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:290: etat kṣetraṃ savikāram indriyādi-vikāra-sahitaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa tubhyaṃ mayoktam iti kṣetropasaṃhāraḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c13u:291: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ prarocitāyārjunāya kṣetra-svarūpaṃ tāvad āha dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:295: avyaktaṃ tat-kāraṇaṃ sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇātmakaṃ pradhānaṃ sarva-kāraṇaṃ na kasyāpi kāryam |
GE07bhg4c13u:300: aupaniṣadānāṃ tu avyaktam avyākṛtam anirvacanīyaṃ māyākhyā pārameśvarī śaktiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:303: ahaṅkāra īkṣaṇānantaram ahaṃ bahu syām iti saṅkalpaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:305: hy avyakta-mahad-ahaṅkārāḥ sāṅkhya-siddhā aupaniṣadair upagamyante 'śabdatvādi-hetubhir iti sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:306: māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram [ŚvetU 4.10] te dhyāna-yogānugatā apaśyan devātma-śaktiṃ sva-guṇair nigūḍhām [ŚvetU 1.3] iti śruti-pratipāditam avyaktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:309: tasmād vā etasmād ātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:313: adbhyaḥ pṛthivī [TaittU 1.1] iti pañca bhūtāni śrautāni |
GE07bhg4c13u:315: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca śrotra-tvak-cakṣū-rasana-ghrāṇākhyāni pañca buddhīndriyāṇi vāk-pāṇi-pāda-pāyūpasthākhyāni pañca karmendriyāṇīti tāni |
GE07bhg4c13u:317: pañca cendriya-goccarāḥ śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhās te buddhīndriyāṇāṃ jñāpyatvena viṣayāḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ tu kāryatvena |
GE07bhg4c13u:319: icchā sukhe tat-sādhane cedaṃ me bhūyād iti spṛhātmā citta-vṛttiḥ kāma iti rāga iti cocyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:320: dveṣo duḥkhe tat-sādhane cedaṃ me mā bhūd iti spṛhā-virodhinī citta-vṛttiḥ krodha itīrṣyeti cocyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:327: tathā ca śrutiḥ - kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhā dhṛtir hrīr dhīr
GE07bhg4c13u:328: bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva [BAU 1.5.3] iti mṛd-ghaṭa itivad upādānābhedena kāryāṇāṃ kāmādīnāṃ mano-dharmatvam āha |
GE07bhg4c13u:329: etat paridṛśyamānaṃ sarvaṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ jaḍaṃ kṣetrajñena sākṣiṇāvabhāsyamānatvāt tad-anātmakaṃ kṣetraṃ bhāsyam acetanaṃ samāsenodāhṛtam uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:330: nanu śarīrendriya-saṃghāta eva cetanaḥ kṣetrajña iti lokāyatikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:333: tat kathaṃ kṣetram evaitat sarvam iti ? tatrāha sa-vikāram iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:334: vikāro janmādir nāśāntaḥ pariṇāmo nairuktaiḥ paṭhitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:335: tat-sahitaṃ sa-vikāram idaṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antam ato na vikāra-sākṣi svotpatti-vināśayoḥ svena draṣṭum aśakyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:336: anyeṣām api sva-dharmāṇāṃ sva-darśanam antareṇa darśanānupapatteḥ svenaiva sva-darśane ca kartṛ-karma-virodhān nirvikāra eva sarva-vikāra-sākṣī | tad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c13u:337: na rte syād vikriyāṃ duḥkhī sākṣitā kā vikāriṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:339: tena vikāritvam eva kṣetra-cihnaṃ na tu parigaṇanam ity arthaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c13u:340: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra kṣetrasya svarūpam āha mahābhūtāny ākāśādīny ahaṅkāras tat-kāraṇam |
GE07bhg4c13u:344: indriya-gocarāḥ pañca śabdādayo viṣayās tad evaṃ caturviṃśati-tattvātmakam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:347: cetanā jñānātmikā mano-vṛttir dhṛtir dhairyam icchādayaś caite mano-dharmā eva na tv ātma-dharmāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:350: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhā dhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva [BAU 1.5.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:351: anena yādṛg iti pratijñātāḥ kṣetra-dharmā darśitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:355: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca ity ādyārdhakena vaktuṃ pratijñātaṃ kṣetra-svarūpam āha -- mahābhūtānīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:356: mahābhūtāni pañca khādīny ahaṅkāras tad-dhetus tāmaso bhūtādi-saṃjño buddhis tad-dheutr jñāna-pradhāno mahān avyaktaṃ tad-dhetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:357_0: triguṇāvasthaṃ pradhānam indriyāṇi śrotrādīni pañca vāg-ādīni ca pañceti bhūtādi-khādy-antarālikāḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:357_1: sūkṣmāḥ śabdādi-tanmātrāḥ khādi-viśeṣa-guṇatayā vyaktāḥ santaḥ sthūlāḥ śrotrādi-pañcaka-grāhyā viṣayā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:359: icchādayaś catvāraḥ prasiddhāḥ saṅkalpādīnām upalakṣaṇam etat |
GE07bhg4c13u:360: ete manodharmāḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhā dhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:361: yadyapy ātma-dharmā icchādayo ya ātmā ity ādau
GE07bhg4c13u:363: paṭhed ya icchet puruṣaḥ iti sahasranāma-stotrāt,
GE07bhg4c13u:364: puruṣaḥ sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur uchyate iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca,
GE07bhg4c13u:368: sa ca cetanā dhṛitr bhogāya mokṣāya ca yatamānasya cetanasya jīvasyādhāratayotpanna ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:370: ya cety asya śrotrādīndiriyāṇi śrotrāśritānīti yādṛg ity asyencchādīni kṣetra-kāryāṇīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:374: etat kṣetraṃ savikāraṃ janmādi-ṣaḍ-vikāropetam udāhṛtam uktam ||5-6||
GE07bhg4c13u:386: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā ||11||
GE07bhg4c13u:388: idānīm ukta-lakṣaṇāt kṣetrāt atiriktatayā jñeyaṃ śuddhaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ vistareṇa varṇayiṣyan śuddha-jñāna-sādhanāny āha amānitvam iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:396: tatra bāhyaṃ mṛj-jalādinā, ābhyantaraṃ ca rāgādi-mala-kṣālanam | tathā ca śrutiḥ --
GE07bhg4c13u:403: etaj jñānam iti proktam iti pañcamenānvayaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c13u:409: taṃ deśaṃ sevituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tasya bhāvas tattvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:410: prākṛtānāṃ janānāṃ saṃsadi sabhāyām aratī raty-abhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:415: tattva-jñānasyārthaḥ prayojanaṃ mokṣas tasya darśanaṃ mokṣasya sarvotkṛṣṭatvālocanam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:416: etad amānitvam adambhitvam ity ādi viṃśati-saṅkhyakaṃ yad uktam etaj jñānam iti proktaṃ vaśiṣṭhādibhiḥ jñāna-sādhanatvāt
GE07bhg4c13u:417: |ato 'nyathāsmād viparītaṃ mānitvādi yat tad ajñānam iti proktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:418: jñāna-virodhitvāt ataḥ sarvathā tyājyam ity arthaḥ ||7-11||
GE07bhg4c13u:420_0: evaṃ kṣetraṃ pratipādya tat-sākṣiṇaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ kṣetrād vivekena vistarāt pratipādayituṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:420_1: taj-jñāna-yogyatvāyāmānitvādi-sādhanāny āha jñeyaṃ yat tad ity ataḥ prāktanaiḥ pañcabhiḥ amānitvam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:421: vidyamānair avidyamānair vā guṇair ātmanaḥ ślāghanaṃ mānitvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:424: teṣāṃ varjanam amānitvam adambhitvam ahiṃsety uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:425: parāparādhe citta-vikāra-hetau prāpte 'pi nirvikāra-cittatayā tad-aparādha-sahanaṃ kṣāntiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:426: ārjavam akauṭilyaṃ yathā-hṛdayaṃ vyavaharaṇaṃ para-pratāraṇā-rāhityam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c13u:427: ācāryo mokṣa-sādhanasyopadeṣṭātra vivakṣito na tu manūkta upanīyādhyāpakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:430: śaucaṃ bāhyaṃ kāya-malānāṃ mṛj-jalābhyāṃ kṣālanam ābhyantaraṃ ca mano-malānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ viṣaya-doṣa-darśana-rūpa-pratipakṣa-bhāvanayāpanayanam |
GE07bhg4c13u:431: sthairyaṃ mokṣa-sādhane pravṛttasyāneka-vidha-vighna-prāptāv api tad-aparityāgena punaḥ punar yatrādhikyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:432: ātma-vinigraha ātmano dehendriya-saṃghātasya svabhāva-prāptāṃ mokṣa-pratikūle pravṛttiṃ nirudhya mokṣa-sādhana eva vyavasthāpanam ||7||
GE07bhg4c13u:433: kiṃ ca - indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu dṛṣṭeṣv ānuśravikeṣu vā bhogeṣu rāga-virodhiny aspṛhātmikā citta-vṛttir vairāgyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:434: ātma-ślāghanābhāve 'pi manasi prādurbhūto 'haṃ sarvotkṛṣṭa iti garvo 'haṅkāras tad-abhāvo 'nahaṅkāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:437: tenāmānitvādīnāṃ viṃśati-saṅkhyākānāṃ samucito yoga eva jñānam iti proktaṃ na tv ekasyāpy abhāva ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:439: kāya-jugupsitatvasya cānudarśanaṃ punaḥ punar ālocanaṃ janmādi-duḥkhānteṣu doṣasyānudarśanaṃ janmādi-vyādhy-anteṣu duḥkha-rūpa-doṣasyānudarśanam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c13u:443: abhiṣvaṅgas tv aham evāyam ity ananyatva-bhāvanayā prīty-atiśayo 'nyasmin sukhini duḥkhini vāham eva sukhī duḥkhī ceti |
GE07bhg4c13u:445: kutra sakty-abhiṣvaṅgau varjanīyāv ata āha putra-dāra-gṛhādiṣu putreṣu dāreṣu gṛheṣu |
GE07bhg4c13u:446: ādi-grahaṇād anyeṣv api bhṛtyādiṣu sarveṣu sneha-viṣayeṣv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:447: nityaṃ ca sarvadā ca sama-cittatvaṃ harṣa-viṣāda-śūnya-manastvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu |
GE07bhg4c13u:452: mayi ca bhagavati vāsudeve parameśvare bhaktiḥ sarvotkṛṣṭatva-jñāna-pūrvikā prītiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:453: ananya-yogena nānyo bhagavato vāsudevāt paro 'sty ataḥ sa eva no gatir ity evaṃ niścayenāpy avyabhicāriṇī kenāpi pratikūlena hetunā nivārayitum aśakyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:454: sāpi jñāna-hetuḥ prītir na yāvan mayi vāsudeva na mucyate deha-yogena tāvat [BhP 5.5.6] ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:455_0: viviktaḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃskārato vā śuddho 'śucibhiḥ sarpa-vyāghrādibhiś ca rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:455_1: suradhunī-pulinādi-śrita-prasāda-karo deśas tat-sevana-śīlatvaṃ vivikta-deśa-sevitvam | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c13u:460_1: tattva-jñāna-pratikūlāyām aratir aramaṇaṃ sādhūnāṃ tu saṃsadi tattva-jñānānukūlāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:461: saṅgaḥ sarvātmanā heyaḥ sa cety uktaṃ na śakyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:462: sa sadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ sataḥ saṅgo hi bheṣajam || iti ||10||
GE07bhg4c13u:464: adhyātma-jñānam ātmānam adhikṛtya pravṛttam ātmānātma-viveka-jñānam adhyātma-jñānaṃ tasmin nityatvaṃ tatraiva niṣṭhāvattvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:468: etad amānitvādi-tattva-jñānārtha-darśanāntaṃ viṃśati-saṅkhyākaṃ jñānam iti proktaṃ jñānārthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:469: ato 'nyathāsmād viparītaṃ mānitvādi yat tad ajñānam iti proktaṃ jñāna-virodhitvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:470: tasmād ajñāna-parityāgena jñānam evopādeyam iti bhāvaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c13u:472: ukta-lakṣaṇāt kṣetrād viviktatayā jñeyau jīvātma-paramātmānau kṣetrajñau vistareṇa varṇayiṣyan taj-jñānasya sādhanāny amānitvādīni viṃśatim āha pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:473: atrāṣṭadaśa bhaktānāṃ jñānināṃ ca sādhāraṇāni kintu bhaktaiḥ mayi cānanya-yogena bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī ity ekam eva bhagavad-anubhava-sādhanatvena yatnataḥ kriyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:474: anyāni spatadaśoktābhyāsavatāṃ teṣāṃ svata evotpadyante na tu teṣu yatna iti sāmpradāyikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:475: antime dve tu jñāninām asādhāraṇa eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:476: atrāmānitvādīni vispaṣṭārthāni | śaucaṃ bāhyam abhyantaraṃ ca tathā ca smṛtiḥ --
GE07bhg4c13u:482: janmādiṣu duḥkha-rūpasya doṣasyānudarśanaṃ punaḥ punaḥ paryālocanam |
GE07bhg4c13u:483_0: asaktiḥ putrādiṣu prīt-tyāgo 'nabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putrādīnāṃ sukhe duḥkhe cāham eva sukhī
GE07bhg4c13u:483_1: duḥkhīty adhyāsābhāva iṣṭāniṣṭayor vyavahārikayor upapattiṣu prāptiṣu nityaṃ sarvadā samacittatvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:484: mayi śyāmasundarākāre 'nanya-yogena jñāna-karma-tapo-yogādy-amiśraṇena bhaktiś ca-kārād jñānādi-miśraṇa-prādhānyena ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:485: ādyā bhaktair anuṣṭheyā dvitīyā jñānibhir iti kecid,
GE07bhg4c13u:486: anye tv ananyā bhaktir yathā-premṇaḥ sādhanaṃ tathā paramātmānubhavasyāpīti jñāpanārtham atra ṣaṭke 'py uktir iti bhaktā vyācakṣate |
GE07bhg4c13u:491: tasya nityatvaṃ nityānuṣṭheyatvaṃ padārtha-śuddhi-niṣṭhatvam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:492: tattva-jñānasyārthaḥ prayojanaṃ mokṣas tasya darśanaṃ svābhīṣṭatvenālocanam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:493: etad viṃśatikaṃ jñānaṃ sādhāraṇyena jīvātma-paramātmanor jñānasya sādhanam |
GE07bhg4c13u:497: athoktāt kṣetrād vibhinnatvena jñeyaṃ kṣetrajña-dvayaṃ vistareṇa nirūpayiṣyan taj-jñāna-sādhanāny amānitvādīni viṃśatim āha pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:513: janmādiṣu duḥkha-rūpasya doṣasyānudarśanaṃ punaḥ punaś cintanam |
GE07bhg4c13u:515: anabhiṣvaṅgas teṣu sukhiṣu duḥkhiṣu ca satsu tat-sukha-duḥkhānabhiniveśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:516: iṣṭāniṣṭānām anukūla-pratikūlānām arthānām upapattiṣu prāptiṣu samacittatvaṃ harṣa-viṣāda-virahaḥ | nityaṃ sarvadā |
GE07bhg4c13u:519: tathā vivikta-deśa-sevitvaṃ nirjana-sthāna-priyatā janānāṃ grāmyāṇāṃ saṃsadi rati-tyāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:520: adhyātmam ātmani yaj jñānaṃ tasya nityatvaṃ sarvadā vimṛśyatvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:521: tattvaṃ tv ahaṃ paraṃ brahma vadanti tattva-vidas tattvaṃ yaj jñānam advayam ity ādi smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:522: taj jñānasya yo 'rthas tat-prāpti-lakṣaṇas tasya darśanaṃ hṛdi smaraṇam |
GE07bhg4c13u:523: etad amānitvādikaṃ jñānaṃ paramparayā sākṣāc ca tad-upalabdhi-sādhanaṃ proktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:525: yat tato 'nyathā viparītaṃ mānitvādi tad ajñānaṃ tad-upalabdhi-virodhīti ||7-11||
GE07bhg4c13u:528: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute |
GE07bhg4c13u:529: anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate ||12||
GE07bhg4c13u:530: śrīdharaḥ : ebhiḥ sādhanair yaj jñeyaṃ tad āha jñeyam iti ṣaḍbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:537: anādi ity etāvataiva bahuvrīhiṇānādimattve siddhe 'pi punar matupaḥ prayogaś chāndasaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:538: yad vā anādīti mat-param iti ca pada-dvayam |
GE07bhg4c13u:539: mam viṣṇoḥ paraṃ nirviśeṣaṃ rūpaṃ brahmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:540: tad evāha na san tan nāsad ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:546: ebhiḥ sādhanair jñāna-śabditaiḥ kiṃ jñeyam ity apekṣāyām āha jñeyaṃ yat tad ity ādi ṣaḍbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:547: yaj jñeyaṃ mumukṣuṇā tat pravakṣyāmi prakarṣeṇa spaṣṭatayā vakṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c13u:548: śrotur abhimukhīkaraṇāya phalena stuvann āha yad vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñeyaṃ jñātvāmṛtam amṛtatvam aśnute saṃsārān mucyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:549: kiṃ tat ? anādimat ādiman na bhavatīty anādimat |
GE07bhg4c13u:551: atrānādīty etāvataiva bahu-vrīhiṇārtha-lābhe 'py atiśāyane nitya-yoge vā matupaḥ prayogaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:552: anādīti ca mat-param iti ca padaṃ kecid icchanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:553: mat saguṇād brahmaṇaḥ paraṃ nirviśeṣa-rūpaṃ brahmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:554: ahaṃ vāsudevākhyā parā śaktir yasyeti tv apavyākhyānam |
GE07bhg4c13u:557: nirviśeṣatvam evāha na sat tan nāsad ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:560: idaṃ tu tad-ubhaya-vilakṣaṇaṃ nirviśeṣatvāt sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpatvāc ca yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha [TaittU 2.4.1] ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:562: ato nocyate kenāpi śabdena mukhyayā vṛttyā śabda-pravṛtti-hetūnāṃ tatrāsambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:563: tad yathā gauraś ca iti vā jātitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:565: śuklaḥ kṛṣṇa iti vā guṇataḥ, dhanī gomān iti vā saṃbandhato 'rthaṃ pratyāyati śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:566: atra kriyā-guṇa-sambandhebhyo vilakṣaṇaḥ sarvo 'pi dharmo jāti-rūpa upādhi-rūpo vā jāti-padena saṃgṛhītaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:567: yadṛcchā-śabdo 'pi ḍittha-ḍapitthādir yaṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c13u:568: pravṛttiṃ nimittīkṛtya pravartata iti so 'pi jāti-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:569: evam ākāśa-śabdo 'pi tārkikāṇāṃ śabdāśrayatvādi-rūpaṃ yaṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ puraskṛtya pravartate |
GE07bhg4c13u:570: sva-mate tu pṛthivyādivad ākāśa-vyaktīnāṃ janyānām anekatvād ākāśatvam api jātir eveti so 'pi jāti-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:573: atireke vā dik-kāla-śabdāv apy upādhi-viśeṣa-pravṛtti-nimittakāv iti jāti-śabdāv eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:575: tatra na sat tan nāsat iti jāti-niṣedhaḥ kriyā-guṇa-sambandhānām api niṣedhopalakṣaṇārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:576: ekam evādvitīyam iti jāti-niṣedhas tasyā aneka-vyakti-vṛtter ekasminn asambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:577: nirguṇaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam [ŚvetU 6.19] iti guṇa-kriyā-sambandhānāṃ krameṇa niṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:580: athāto ādeśo neti neti [BAU 2.3.6] iti ca sarva-niṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:581: tasmād brahma na kenacic chabdenocyata iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:582: tarhi kathaṃ pravakṣyāmīty uktaṃ kathaṃ vā śāstra-yonitvāt iti sūtram [Vs 1.1.3] |
GE07bhg4c13u:583: yathā kathaṃcil lakṣaṇayā śabdena pratipādanād ii gṛhāṇa |
GE07bhg4c13u:584: pratipādana-prakāraś ca āścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam [Gītā 2.28] ity atra vyākhyātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:586: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ sādhanair jñeyo jīvātmā paramātmā ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:588: tac ca brahma nirviśeṣaṃ saviśeṣaṃ ca krameṇa jñāni-bhaktayor upāsyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:591: anādi na vidyate ādir yasya mat-svarūpatvān nityam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:592: mat-param aham eva para utkṛṣṭa āśrayo yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:594: tad eva kim ity apekṣāyām āha |
GE07bhg4c13u:595: tad brahma na sat nāpy asat, kārya-kāraṇātītam ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c13u:596: baladevaḥ : evaṃ jñāna-sādhanāny upadiśya tair jñeyam upadiśati jñeyaṃ yat tad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:597: uktaiḥ sādhanair yaj jñeyam upalabhyaṃ jīvātmavastu ca tad ahaṃ prakarṣeṇa subodhatayā vakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā jano 'mṛtaṃ mokṣam aśnute labhate |
GE07bhg4c13u:599: nāsty ādir yasya tat jīvasyādy-utpattir nāsty ato 'not 'pi neti nityāsāv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:600: evam āha śrutiḥ -- na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit [KaṭhU 1.2.18] ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:601: aham eva paraḥ svāmī yasya tat pradhāna-kṣetrajña-patir guṇeśaḥ [ŚvetU 6.16] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:602: dāsabhūto harer eva nānyasyaiva kadācana iti smṛteś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:604: śrutiś caivam āha ya ātmāpahata-pāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijghitso 'pipāsaḥ satya-saṅkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:606: jīve brahma-śabdas tu vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda [TaittU 2.5.1] ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:608: brahma-bhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati [Gītā 18.55] iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:609: na sad iti tad viśuddhaṃ jīvātma-vastu kārya-kāraṇātmakāvasthā-dvaya-virahāt sac cāsac ca nocyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:610: kintu paramāṇu-caitanyaṃ guṇāṣṭaka-viśiṣṭam ucyate - vibhakta-nāma-rūpaṃ kāryāvasthaṃ sad-upamṛdita-nāma-rūpaṃ kāraṇāvasthaṃ tv asad ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c13u:614: sarvataḥ śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ||13||
GE07bhg4c13u:616_0: nanv evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sad-asad-vilakṣaṇatve sati -- sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma brahmaivedaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:616_1: sarvam ity ādi-śrutibhir virudhyeta ity āśaṅkya parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate
GE07bhg4c13u:616_2: svābhāvikī jñāna-bala-kriyā ca ity ādi śruti-prasiddhayācintya-śaktyā sarvātmatāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:616_3: tasya darśayann āha sarvata iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:617: sarvataḥ sarvatra pāṇayaḥ pādāś ca yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:618: sarvato 'kṣīṇi śirāṃsi mukhāni ca yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:619: sarvataḥ śrutimat śravaṇendriyair yuktaṃ sal-loke sarvam āvṛtya vyāpya tiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c13u:620: sarva-prāṇi-vṛttibhiḥ pāṇy-ādibhir upādhibhiḥ sarva-vyavahārāspadatvena tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c13u:622_0: evaṃ nirupādhikasya brahmaṇaḥ sac-chabda-pratyayāviṣayatvād asattvāśaṅkāyāṃ nāsad
GE07bhg4c13u:622_1: ity anenāpāstāyām api vistareṇa tad-āśaṅkā-nivṛtty-arthaṃ sarva-prāṇi-karaṇopādhi-dvāreṇa
GE07bhg4c13u:622_2: cetana-kṣetrajña-rūpatayā tad-astitvaṃ pratipādayann āha sarvata iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:623: sarvataḥ sarveṣu deheṣu pāṇayaḥ pādāś cācetanāḥ sva-sva-vyāpāreṣu pravartanīyā ysays cetanasya kṣetrajṇasya tat sarvataḥ pāṇi-pādaṃ jñeyaṃ brahma |
GE07bhg4c13u:624: sarvācetana-pravṛttīnāṃ cetanādhiṣṭhāna-pūrvakatvāt tasmin kṣetrajñe cetane brahmaṇi jñeye sarvācetana-varga-pravṛtti-hetau nāsti nāstitāśaṅkety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:625: evaṃ sarvato 'kṣīṇi śirāṃsi mukhāni ca yasya pravartanīyāni santi tat sarvato 'kṣi-śiro-mukhaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:626: evaṃ sarvataḥ śrutayaḥ śravaṇendriyāṇi yasya pravartanīyatvena santa tat sarvataḥ śrutimat |
GE07bhg4c13u:628: ekam eva nityaṃ vibhu ca sarvam acetanavargam āvṛtya sva-sattayā sphūrtyā cādhyāsikena sambandhena vyāpya tiṣṭhati nirvikāram eva sthitiṃ labhate,
GE07bhg4c13u:629: na tu svādhyastasya jaḍa-prapañcasya doṣeṇa guṇena vāṇu-mātreṇāpi sambadhyata ity arthaḥ | yathā
GE07bhg4c13u:630: ca sarveṣu deheṣv ekam eva cetanaṃ nityaṃ vibhu ca na pratidehaṃ bhinnaṃ tathā prapañcitaṃ prāk ||13||
GE07bhg4c13u:632_0: nanv evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sad-asad-vilakṣaṇatve sati -- sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma brahmaivedaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:632_1: sarvam ity ādi-śrutir virudhyeta ity āśaṅkya svarūpataḥ kārya-kāraṇātītatve 'pi śakti-śaktimator
GE07bhg4c13u:632_2: abhedāt kārya-kāraṇātmakam api tad ity āha sarvata eva pāṇayaḥ pādāś ca yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:633: brahmādi-pipīlikāntānāṃ pāṇi-pāda-vṛndaiḥ sarvatra dṛṣṭair eva tad brahmaivāsaṅkhya-pāṇi-pādair yuktm ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:641: asaktaṃ sarva-bhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇa-bhoktṛ ca ||14||
GE07bhg4c13u:643: sarveṣāṃ cakṣur-ādīnāṃ guṇeṣu rūpādy-ākārāsu vṛttiṣu tat-tad-ākāreṇa bhāsate iti tathā |
GE07bhg4c13u:644: sarvendriyāṇi guṇāṃś ca tat-tad-viṣayān ābhāsayatīti vā |
GE07bhg4c13u:646: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- apāṇi-pādo javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇaḥ ity ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:650: guṇa-bhoktṛ ca guṇānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ bhoktṛ pālakam ||14||
GE07bhg4c13u:652_0: adhyāropāpavādābhyāṃ niṣprapañcaṃ prapañcyate iti nyāyam anusṛtya sarva-prapañcādhyāropeṇānādi-mat
GE07bhg4c13u:652_1: paraṃ brahmeti vyākhyātam adhunā tad-apavādena na sat tan nāsad ucyate iti vyākhyātum
GE07bhg4c13u:653_0: paramārthataḥ sarvendriya-vivarjitaṃ tan-māyayā sarvendriya-guṇābhāsaṃ sarveṣāṃ bahiṣkaraṇānāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:653_1: śrotrādīnām antaḥkaraṇayoś ca buddhi-manasor guṇair adhyavasāya-saṅkalpa-śravaṇa-vacanādibhis
GE07bhg4c13u:653_2: tat-tad-viṣaya-rūpatayāvabhāsata iva sarvendriya-vyāpārair vyāpṛtam iva taj jñeyaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:657: māyayā sarva-bhṛc ca sadātmanā sarvaṃ kalpitaṃ dhārayatīva poṣayatīti ca sarva-bhṛt,
GE07bhg4c13u:660: guṇa-bhoktṛ ca guṇānāṃ sattva-rajas-tamasāṃ śabdādi-dvārā sukha-duḥkha-mohākāreṇa pariṇatānāṃ bhoktṛ upalabdhṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ brahmety arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c13u:662: kiṃ ca sarvāṇi indriyāṇi guṇān indriya-viṣayāṃś ca ābhāsayatīti tac cakṣuṣaś cakṣuḥ ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:663: yad vā sarvendriyair guṇaiḥ śabdādibhiś cābhāsate virājatīti tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:665: tathā ca śrutiḥ - apāṇi-pādo javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇaḥ ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c13u:666: parāsya śaktir bahudhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna-bala-kriyā ca iti śruti-prasiddha-svarūpa-śaktyāspadatvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:671_0: kiṃ ca sarveti sarvair indriyair guṇaiś ca tad-vṛttibhir ābhāsate dīpyata iti tathā
GE07bhg4c13u:671_1: sarvair indriyair jīvendriyavat svarūpa-bhinnair vivarjitaṃ santyaktaṃ prākṛtaiḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:671_2: karaṇaiḥ śūnyaḥ svarūpānubandhibhis tair viśiṣṭo harir iti svīkāryam |
GE07bhg4c13u:672: apāṇi-pādo javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:673_0: yad ātmako bhagavāṃs tad-ātmikā vyaktiḥ kim ātmako bhagavān jñānātmaka aiśvaryātmakaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:673_1: śaktyātmakaś ceti buddhimano 'ṅga-pratyaṅgavattāṃ bhagavato lakṣayāmahe buddhimān
GE07bhg4c13u:674_0: sarvabhṛt sarva-tattva-dhārakam apy asaktaṃ saṅkalpenaiva tad-dhāraṇāt tat-sparśa-rahitaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:674_1: nirguṇaṃ sākṣī cetāḥ kevalo nirguṇaś ca iti śruter māyā-guṇa-spṛṣṭam eva sad-guṇa-bhoktṛ-niyamyatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:682: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:683: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūra-sthaṃ cāntike ca tat ||15||
GE07bhg4c13u:685: bhūtānāṃ carācarāṇāṃ svakāryāṇāṃ bahiś cāntaś ca tad eva suvarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuntalādīnām |
GE07bhg4c13u:687: acaraṃ sthāvaraṃ caraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca bhūta-jātaṃ tad eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:689: evam api sūkṣmatvād rūpādi-hīnatvād tad avijñeyam idaṃ tad iti spaṣṭaṃ jñānārhaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:692: viduṣāṃ punaḥ pratyag-ātmatvād antike ca tan nityaṃ sannihitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:698: ejati calati naijati na calati | tad u antike iti cchedaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c13u:700: bhūtānāṃ bhavana-dharmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ kalpitānām akalpitam adhiṣṭhānam ekam eva bahir antaś ca rajjur iva sva-kalpitānāṃ sarpa-dhārādīnāṃ sarvātmanā vyāpakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:701: ata evācaraṃ sthāvaraṃ caraṃ ca jañgamaṃ bhūta-jātaṃ tad evādhiṣṭhānātmakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:702: kalpitānāṃ na tataḥ kiṃcid vyatiricyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:703: evaṃ sarvātmaktve 'pi sūkṣmtvād rūpādi-hīnatvāt tad-avijñeyam idam evam iti spaṣṭa-jñānārhaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:704: ata evātma-jñāna-sādhana-śūnyānāṃ varṣa-sahasra-koṭyāpy aprāpyatvād dūrasthaṃ ca yojana-lakṣa-koṭy-antaritam iva tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:705: jñāna-sādhana-sampannānāṃ tu antike ca tad atyavyavahitam evātmatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:706: dūrāt sudūre tad ihāntike paśatsv ihaiva nihitaṃ guhāyām [MuṇḍU 3.1.7] ity ādi śrutibhyaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c13u:707: viśvanāthaḥ : bhūtānāṃ svakāryāṇāṃ bahiś cāntaś ca yathā dehānām ākāśādikam |
GE07bhg4c13u:708: acaraṃ sthāvaraṃ caraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca bhūta-jātaṃ tad eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:710_0: evam api rūpādibhinnatvāt tad-avijñeyam idaṃ tad iti spaṣṭaṃ jñānārhaṃ na bhavatīty
GE07bhg4c13u:710_1: ata evāviduṣāṃ yojana-koṭy-antaram iva dūrasthaṃ viduṣāṃ punaḥ sva-gṛha-sthitam evāntike
GE07bhg4c13u:710_2: ca tat svadeha evāntaryāmitvāt dūrāt sudūre tad ihāntike ca paśyatsv ihaiva nihitaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:712: bhūtānāṃ cij-jaḍātmakānāṃ tattvānāṃ bahir antaś ca sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:713: antar bahiś ca tat sarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ [MNāU 13.5] iti śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:714: acaram acalaṃ caraṃ calaṃ ca āsīno dūraṃ vrajati śayāno yāti sarvataḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.21] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:715: sūkṣmatvāt pratyaktvāc cit-sukha-mūrtitvād avijñeyaṃ devatāntaravaj jñātum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:716: ato dūrasthaṃ ceti yan manasā na manute na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam [ŚvetU 4.20] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:717: gāndharva-vāsitena śrotreṇa ṣaḍ-jādivad bhakti-bhāvitena karaṇena tu śakyaṃ taj jñātum ity āha antike ca tad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:719: bhakti-yoge hi tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.78] ity ādi śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:720: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakyaḥ [Gītā 11.55] ity ādi smṛteś ca ||15||
GE07bhg4c13u:723: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:724: bhūta-bhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca ||16||
GE07bhg4c13u:726: bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakeṣu avibhaktaṃ kāraṇātmanābhinnaṃ kāryātmanā vibhaktaṃ bhinnam ivāvasthitaṃ ca samudrāj jātaṃ phenādi samudrād anyan na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:727: tat-svarūpam evoktaṃ jñeyaṃ bhūtānāṃ bhartṛ ca poṣakaṃ sthiti-kāle |
GE07bhg4c13u:728: pralaya-kāle ca grasiṣṇu grasana-śīlaṃ sṛṣṭi-kāle ca prabhaviṣṇu nānā-kāryātmanā prabhavana-śīlam ||16||
GE07bhg4c13u:730: yad uktam ekam eva sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhatīti tad vivṛṇoti pratideham ātma-bheda-vādināṃ nirāsāya avibhaktam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:731: bhūteṣu sarva-prāṇiṣu avibhaktam abhinnam ekam eva tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:732: na tu pratidehaṃ bhinnaṃ vyomavat sarva-vyāpakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:733: tathāpi deha-tādātmyena pratīyamānatvāt pratidehaṃ vibhaktam iva ca sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:734: aupādikatvenāpāramārthiko vyomnīva tatra bhedāvabhāsa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:735: nanu bhavatu kṣetrajñaḥ sarva-vyāpaka ekaḥ, brahma tu jagat-kāraṇaṃ tato bhinnam eveti |
GE07bhg4c13u:736: nety āha bhūta-bhartṛ ca bhūtāni sarvāṇi sthiti-kāle bibhartīti tathā pralaya-kāle grasiṣṇu grasana-śīlam utpatti-kāle prabhaviṣṇu ca prabhavana-śīlaṃ sarvasya |
GE07bhg4c13u:738: tasmād yaj jagataḥ sthiti-layotpatti-kāraṇaṃ brahma tad eva kṣetrajñaṃ pratideham ekaṃ jñeyaṃ na tato 'nyad ity arthaḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c13u:740: bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakeṣu avibhaktaṃ kāraṇātmanā abhinnaṃ kāryātmanā vibhaktaṃ bhinnam ivā sthitaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:746: vibhakteṣu mitho bhinneṣu jīveṣv avibhaktam ekaṃ tad brahma vibhaktam iva prati-jīvaṃ bhinnam iva sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:747: ekaṃ santaṃ bahudhā dṛśyamānam iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:752: tac ca bhūta-bhartṛ-sthitau bhūtānāṃ pālakaṃ pralaye teṣāṃ grasiṣṇu kāla-śaktyā saṃhārakaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:754: śrutiś ca yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante yena jātāni jīvanti yat prayanty abhisaṃviśanti tad brahma tad vijijñāsasva [TaittU 3.1.1] iti ||16||
GE07bhg4c13u:757: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:758: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ||17||
GE07bhg4c13u:760: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnām api jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:762: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:765: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:768: jñānaṃ ca tad eva buddhi-vṛttau abhivyaktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:769: tad eva rūpādy-ākāreṇa jñeyaṃ ca jñāna-gamyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:771: jñāna-gamyaṃ viśinaṣṭi sarvasya prāṇimātrasya hṛdi viṣṭhitaṃ viśeṣeṇāpracyuta-svarūpeṇa niyantṛtayā sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:772: dhiṣṭhitam iti pāṭhe adhiṣṭāya sthitim ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:773: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu sarvatra vidyamānam api tan nopalabhyate cet tarhi jaḍam eva syāt,
GE07bhg4c13u:774: na syāt svayaṃjyotiṣo 'pi tasya rūpādi-hīnatvenendriyādy-agrāhyatvopapatter ity āha jyotiṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:775: taj jñeyaṃ brahma jyotiṣām avabhāsakānām ādityādīnāṃ buddhy-ādīnāṃ ca bāhyānām āntarāṇām api jyotir avabhāsakaṃ caityanya-jyotiṣo jaḍa-jyotir-avabhāsakatvopapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:777: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:778: vakṣyati ca yad āditya-gataṃ tejaḥ [Gītā 15.8] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c13u:779_0: svayaṃ jaḍatvābhāve 'pi jaḍa-saṃsṛṣṭaṃ syād iti nety āha tamaso jaḍa-vargāt param
GE07bhg4c13u:779_1: avidyā-tat-kāryābhyām apāramārthikābhyām asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ pāramārthikaṃ tad brahma sad-asatoḥ sambandhāyogāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:780: ucyate akṣarāt parataḥ paraḥ ity ādi-śrutibhir brahma-vādibhiś ca | tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c13u:783: āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:784: āditya-varṇam iti sva-bhāne prakāśāntarānapekṣaṃ sarvasya prakāśakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:785: yasmāt tat svayaṃ jyotir jaḍāsaṃspṛṣṭam ata eva taj jñānaṃ pramāṇa-janya-ceto-vṛtty-abhivyakta-saṃvid-rūpam |
GE07bhg4c13u:786: ata eva tad eva jñeyaṃ jātum arham ajñātatvāj jaḍasyājñātatvābhāvena jñātum anarhatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:787_0: kathaṃ tarhi sarvair na jñāyate tatrāha jñāna-gamyaṃ pūrvoktenāmānitvādinā tattva-jñānārtha-darśanāntena
GE07bhg4c13u:787_1: sādhana-kalāpena jñāna-hetutayā jñāna-śabditena gamyaṃ prāpyaṃ na tu tad vinety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:788: nanu sādhanena gamyaṃ cet tat kiṃ deśāntara-vyavahitam ?
GE07bhg4c13u:789_0: nety āha hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitaṃ sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya hṛdi buddhau viṣṭhitaṃ sarvatra
GE07bhg4c13u:789_1: sāmānyena sthitam api viśeṣa-rūpeṇa tatra sthitam abhivyaktaṃ jīva-rūpeṇāntaryāmi-rūpeṇa ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:791: avyavahitam eva vastuto bhrāntyā vyavahitam iva sarva-bhrama-kāraṇājñāna-nivṛttyā prāpyata ivety arthaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c13u:792: viśvanāthaḥ : jyotiṣāṃ candrādityānām api taj jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ | yena sūryas tapati tejasendhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:793: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:796: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:797: ata eva tamaso 'jñānāt paraṃ tenāsaṃsṛṣṭam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:799: jñānaṃ tad eva buddhi-vṛttau abhivyaktaṃ sat jñānam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:800: tad eva rūpādy-ākāreṇa pariṇataṃ jñeyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:801: tad eva jñāna-gamyaṃ pūrvoktenāmānitvādi-jñāna-sādhanena prāpyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:802: tad eva paramātma-svarūpaṃ sat sarvasya prāṇimātrasya hṛdi dhiṣṭhitaṃ niyantṛtayādhbiṣṭhāya sthitam ity arthaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c13u:803: baladevaḥ : jyotiṣāṃ sūrydīnām api tad brahma jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:804: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:809: tad brahma tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ paraṃ tenāspṛṣṭam ucyate āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt [ŚvetU 3.8] ity śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:810: jñānaṃ cid-eka-rasam ucyate vijñānam ānanda-ghanaṃ brahma [GTU 2.79?] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:811: jñānaṃ mumukṣoḥ śaraṇatvena jñātum arham ucyate taṃ ha devam ātma-buddhi-prakāśaṃ mumukṣur vai śaraṇam ahaṃ prapadye [GTU 1.25] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:812: jñāna-gamyam ucyate tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:813: sarvasya prāṇi-mātrasya hṛdi dhiṣṭhitaṃ niyantṛtayādhiṣṭhāya sthitam ity ucyate antaḥ-praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām [TaittĀ 3.11.10] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:814: na ca sarvataḥ pāṇīty ādi pañcakaṃ jīva-paratayaiva neyaṃ tat-prakaraṇatvādi-vācyaṃ jīvavad īśvarasyāpi kṣetrajñatvena prakṛtatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:819: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:821: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāri-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:824: jñeyaṃ cānādimat paraṃ brahmety ādi viṣṭhitam ity antam |
GE07bhg4c13u:825: vasiṣṭhādibhir vistareṇoktaṃ sarvam api mayā saṅkṣepeṇoktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:827: pūrvādhyāyokta-lakṣaṇo mad-bhakto vijñāya mad-bhāvāya brahmatvāyopapadyate yogyo bhavati ||18||
GE07bhg4c13u:828: madhusūdanaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāriṇaṃ phalaṃ ca vadann upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:829: iti anena pūrvoktena prakāreṇa kṣetraṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:831: jñeyaṃ cānādimat paraṃ brahma viṣṭhitam ity antaṃ śrutibhyaḥ smṛtibhyaś cākṛṣya trayam api manda-buddhy-anugrahāya mayā saṃkṣepenoktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:832: etāvān eva hi sarvo vedārtho gītārthaś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:833_0: asmiṃś ca pūrvādhyāyokta-lakṣaṇo mad-bhakta evādhikārīty āha -- mad-bhakto mayi bhagavati
GE07bhg4c13u:833_1: vāsudeve parama-gurau samarpita-sarvātma-bhāvo mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sa etad yathoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:833_2: kṣetraṃ jñānaṃ ca jñeyaṃ ca vijñāya vivekena viditvā mad-bhāvāya sarvānartha-śūnya-paramānanda-bhāvāya
GE07bhg4c13u:834: yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ yathā deve tathā gurau |
GE07bhg4c13u:835: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ || [ŚvetU 6.23] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:836: tasmāt sarvadā mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sann ātma-jñāna-sādhanāny eva parama-puruṣārtha-lipsur anuvartate tuccha-viṣaya-bhoga-spṛhāṃ hitvety abhiprāyaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c13u:837: viśvanāthaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāri-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:840: jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ ca anādīty ādi dhiṣṭhitam ity antam |
GE07bhg4c13u:841: ekam eva tattvaṃ brahma bhagavat-paramātma-śabda-vācyaṃ ca saṅkṣepeṇoktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:843: yad vā mad-bhakto mamaikāntiko dāsa etad vijñāya mat-prabhor etāvad aiśvaryam iti jñātvā mayi bhāvāya premṇa upapadyata upapanno bhavati ||18||
GE07bhg4c13u:844: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikaṃ taj-jñāna-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati iti kṣetram iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:845: mahā-bhūtāni ity ādinā cetanā dhṛtir ity antena kṣetra-svarūpam uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:846: amānitvam ity ādinā tattva-jñānārtha-darśanam ity antena jñeyasya kṣetra-dvayasya jñānaṃ tat-sādhanam uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:847: anādi mat-param ity ādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ity antena jñeyaṃ kṣetrajña-dvayaṃ coktaṃ mayā |
GE07bhg4c13u:848: etat trayaṃ vijñāya mitho vivekenāvagatya mad-bhāvāya mat-premṇe mat-svabhāvāya vāsaṃsāritvāya kalpate yogye bhavati mad-bhaktaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c13u:851: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api |
GE07bhg4c13u:852: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān ||19||
GE07bhg4c13u:853: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk cety etāvat prapañcitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:854: idānīṃ tu yad vikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś cety etat pūrvaṃ pratijñātam eva prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ saṃsāra-hetukatva-kathanena prapañcayati prakṛtim iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:855: tatra prakṛti-puruṣayor ādimatve tayor api prakṛty-antareṇa bhāvyam ity anavasthāpattiḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:859: atra ca parameśvarasya tac-chaktīnām anāditvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca śrīmac-chaṅkara-bhagavad-bhāṣya-kṛdbhir atiprabandhenopapāditam iti grantha-bāhulyān nāsmābhiḥ pratanyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:860: vikārāṃś ca dehendriyādīn guṇāṃś ca guṇa-pariṇāmān sukha-duḥkha-mohādīn prakṛteḥ sambhūtān viddhi ||19||
GE07bhg4c13u:861: madhusūdanaḥ : tad anena granthena tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca ity etad vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c13u:862: idānīṃ yad-vikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca ity etāvad vyākhyātavyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:863: tatra prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ saṃsāra-hetutva-kathanena yad-vikāri yataś ca yad iti prakṛtim ity ādi dvābhyāṃ prapañcyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:864: sa ca yo yat prabhāvaś ca iti tu puruṣa ity ādi dvyābhyām iti vivekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:865: tatra saptama īśvarasya dve prakṛtī parāpare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe upanyasya etad-yonīni bhūtāni [Gītā 7.7] ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:866: tatrāparā prakṛtiḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇā parā tu jīva-lakṣaṇeti tayor anāditvam uktvā tad-ubhaya-yonitvaṃ bhūtānām ucyate prakṛtim iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:867: prakṛtir māyākhyā triguṇātmikā pārameśvarī śaktiḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇā yā prāg aparā prakṛtir ity uktā |
GE07bhg4c13u:868: yā tu parā prakṛtir jīvākhyā prāg uktā sa iha puruṣa ity ukta iti na pūrvāpara-virodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:869: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ cobhāv api anādī eva viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:870: na vidyate ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yayos tau |
GE07bhg4c13u:873: puruṣasyānāditvaṃ tad-dharmādharma-prayuktatvāt kṛtsnasya jagataḥ jātasya harṣa-śoka-bhaya-sampratipatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:875_0: yataḥ prakṛtir anādir atas tasyā bhūta-yonitvam uktaṃ prāg upapadyata ity āha vikārāṃś
GE07bhg4c13u:875_1: ca ṣoḍaśa pañca mahā-bhūtāny ekādaśendriyāṇi ca guṇāṃś ca sattva-rajas-tamo-rūpān
GE07bhg4c13u:878: paramātmānam uktvā kṣetra-jña-śabda-vācyaṃ jīvātmānaṃ vaktuṃ kutas tasya māyā-saṃsleṣaḥ,
GE07bhg4c13u:879: kadā tad-ārambho 'bhūd ity apekṣāyām āha prakṛtiṃ māyāṃ puruṣaṃ jīvaṃ cobhāv apy anādī na vidyate ādi kāraṇaṃ yayos tathābhūtau viddhi anāder īśvarasya mama śaktitvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:880: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:881: ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā ||
GE07bhg4c13u:882: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām |
GE07bhg4c13u:884: iti mad-ukter māyā-jīvayor api mac-chaktitvena anāditvāt tayoḥ saṃśleṣo 'pi anādir iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:885_0: tatra mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭayor api tayor vastutaḥ pārthakyam asti eva ity āha vikārāṃś
GE07bhg4c13u:885_1: ca dehendriyādīn guṇāṃś ca guṇa-pariṇāmān sukha-duḥkha-śoka-mohādīn prakṛti-sambhūtān
GE07bhg4c13u:885_2: prakṛty-udbhūtān viddhīti kṣetrākāra-pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛteḥ sakāśād bhinnam eva jīvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:887_0: evaṃ mitho vivikta-svabhāvayor anādyoḥ prakṛti-jīvayoḥ saṃsargasyānādi-kālikatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:887_1: saṃsṛṣṭayos tayoḥ kārya-bhedas tat-saṃsargasyānādi-kālikasya hetuś ca nirūpyate prakṛtim ity ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:889: mithaḥ sampṛktau prakṛti-puruṣāv ubhāv anādyeva viddhi madīya-śaktitvān nityāv eva jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:890: tayor mac-chaktitvaṃ tu puraivoktaṃ bhūmir āpaḥ ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c13u:891: anādi-saṃsṛṣṭayor api tayoḥ svarūpa-bhedo 'stīty āśayenāh vikārān dehendriyādīn |
GE07bhg4c13u:892: guṇāṃś sukha-duḥkhāni prakṛti-sambhavān prākṛtān na tu jaivān viddhīti kṣetrātmanā pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛter anyo jīva iti darśitam ||19||
GE07bhg4c13u:897: śrīdharaḥ : vikārāṇāṃ prakṛti-sambhavatvaṃ darśayan puruṣasya saṃsāra-hetutvaṃ darśayati kāryeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:900: teṣāṃ kartṛtve tad-ākāra-pariṇāme prakṛtir hetur ucyate kapilādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:901: puruṣo jīvas tu tat-kṛta-sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:902: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yadyapi acetanāyāḥ prakṛteḥ svataḥ-kartṛtvaṃ na sambhavati tathā puruṣasyāpy avikāriṇo bhoktṛtvaṃ na sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:904: tac cācetanasyāpi cetanādṛṣṭa-vaśāt caitanyādhiṣṭhitatvāt sambhavati yathā vahner ūrdhva-jvalanaṃ vayos tiryag gamanaṃ vatsādṛṣṭa-vaśāt gostanya-payasaḥ kṣaraṇam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c13u:905: ataḥ puruṣa-sannidhānāt prakṛteḥ kartṛtvam ucyate bhoktṛtvaṃ ca sukha-duḥkha-saṃvedanaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:906: tac ca cetana-dharma eveti prakṛti-sannidhānāt puruṣasya bhoktṛtvam ucyate iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c13u:908: vikārāṇāṃ prakṛti-sambhavattvaṃ vivecayan puruṣasya saṃsāra-hetutvaṃ darśayati kāryeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:909: kāryaṃ śarīraṃ karaṇānīndriyāṇi tat-sthāni trayodaśa dehārambhakāṇi bhūtāni viṣayāś ceha kārya-grahaṇena gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c13u:910: guṇāś ca sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakāḥ karaṇāśrayatvāt karaṇa-grahaṇena gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c13u:911: teṣāṃ kārya-karaṇānāṃ kartṛtve tad-ākāra-pariṇāme hetuḥ kāraṇam prakṛtir ucyate maharṣibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:913: evaṃ prakṛteḥ saṃsāra-kāraṇatvaṃ vyākhyāya puruṣasyāpi yādṛśaṃ tat tad āha puruṣo kṣetrajñaḥ parā prakṛtir iti prāg vyākhyātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:914: sa sukha-duḥkhānāṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohānāṃ bhogyānāṃ sarveṣām api bhoktṛtve vṛtty-uparaktopalambhe hetur ucyate ||20||
GE07bhg4c13u:918: kartāra indriyādhiṣṭhātāro devās tatra tathādhyāsena puruṣa-saṃsargāt kāryādi-rūpeṇa pariṇatā syād avidyākhyayā sva-vṛttyā tad-adhyāsa-pradā ca syād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:919: tat-kṛta-sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve puruṣo jīva eva hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:920: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yadyapi kāryatva-kāraṇatva-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvāni prakṛti-dharmā eva syus tad api kāryatvādiṣu jaḍāṃśa-prādhānyāt,
GE07bhg4c13u:922: prādhānyena vyapadeśā bhavantīti nyāyāt kāryatvādiṣu prakṛtir hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:923: bhoktṛtve puruṣo hetur ity ucyate iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c13u:925: atha saṃsṛṣṭayos tayoḥ kārya-bhedam āha kāryeti śarīraṃ kāryaṃ jñāna-karma-sādhakatvād indriyāṇi kāraṇāni teṣāṃ kartṛtve tat-tad-ākāra-sva-pariṇāme prakṛtir hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:926: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi ity agrimāt sva-saṃsargeṇa sacetanāṃ prakṛtiṃ puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c13u:927: tad-adhiṣṭhitā tu sā tat-karmāṇu-guṇyena pariṇamamānā tat-tad-dehādīnāṃ sraṣṭrīti prakṛtyārpitānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ bhoktṛtve puruṣo hetus teṣāṃ bhoge sa eva kartey arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:929: tac ca śarīrādi-kartṛtvaṃ tu tad-adhiṣṭhātāyāḥ prakṛter iti puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ mukhyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:930: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ity ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:935: puruṣaḥ prakṛti-stho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān |
GE07bhg4c13u:937: śrīdharaḥ : tathāpy avikāriṇo janma-rahitasya ca bhoktṛtvaṃ katham iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:940: prakṛti-sthas tat-kārye dehe tādātmyena sthitaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:942: asya ca puruṣasya satīṣu devādi-yoniṣu asatīṣu tiryag-ādi-yoniṣu yāni janmāni teṣu guṇa-saṅgo guṇaiḥ śubhāśubha-karma-kāribhir indriyaiḥ saṅgaḥ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c13u:944: yat puruṣasya sukha-duḥkha-bhoktṛtvaṃ tādātmyenopagataḥ prakṛti-stho hy eva puruṣo bhuṅkte upalabhate prakṛti-jān guṇān |
GE07bhg4c13u:945: ataḥ prakṛti-ja-guṇopalambha-hetuṣu sad-asad-yoni-janmasu sad-yonayo devādyās teṣu hi sāttvikam iṣataṃ phalaṃ bhujyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:946: asad-yonayaḥ paśv-ādyās teṣu hi tāmasam aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhujyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:947: atas tan nāsya puruṣasya guṇa-saṅgaḥ sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇātmaka-prakṛti-tādātmyābhimāna eva kāraṇam |
GE07bhg4c13u:948: na tv asaṅgasya tasya svataḥ saṃsāra ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:949: athavā guṇa-saṅgo guṇeṣu śabdādiṣu sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakeṣu saṅgo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāma iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c13u:950: sa evāsya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu kāraṇam sa yathā-kāmo bhavati tat kratur bhavati yat kratur bhavati tat karma kurute yat karma kurute tad abhisampadyate [BAU 4.4.5] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:954: kintu tatra anādy-avidyā-kṛtenādhyāsena eva karṭrva-bhoktṛtvādikaṃ tadīyam api dharmaṃ svīyaṃ manyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:955: tata evāsya saṃsāra ity āha puruṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:957: prakṛtijān antaḥkaraṇa-dharmān śoka-moha-sukha-duḥkhādīn guṇān svīyān eva abhimanyamāno bhuṅkte |
GE07bhg4c13u:960: kva bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha satīṣu devādi-yoniṣu asatīṣu tiryag-ādi-yoniṣu śubhāśubha-karma-kṛtāsu yāni janmāni teṣu ||21||
GE07bhg4c13u:962: prakṛty-adhiṣṭhāne sikhādibhoge ca puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam ity etat sphuṭayati tasya prakṛti-saṃsarge hetuṃ ca darśayati puruṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:963_1: prāna-viśiṣṭaḥ sann eva tat-kṛtān guṇān sukhādīn bhuṅkte 'nubhavati kvety āha sad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:964: satīṣu deva-mānavādiṣv asatīṣu paśu-pakṣy-ādiṣu ca sādhv-asādhu-racitāsu yoniṣu yāni janmādīni teṣv iti tatra tatra puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:968: sa ca bhoktṛtvād bhogyān viṣayān spṛhayaṃs tad-arpita-kāmanādi-sannihitāṃ prakṛtim āśrayiṣyati yāvat sat-prasaṅgāt tat-tad-vāsanā kṣīyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:969: tat-kṣaye tu parātma-dhāma-sukhāni bhuṅkte so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā ity ādi śrutibhya iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:970: yat tu prakṛter ity ādeḥ kārya-kāraṇety ādeḥ prakṛtyaiva cety āder nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ ity ādeś cāpātatārtha-grāhibhiḥ sāṅkhyaiḥ prakṛter eva kartṛtvam uktaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:971: tat kila rabhasābhidhānam eva loṣṭra-kāṣṭhavad acetanāyās tasyās tattva-sambhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:973: tac ca cetanasyaiveti śrutir āha - vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:975: eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā rasayitā ghrātā mantā boddhā kartā nijñānātmā puruṣaḥ ity ādikam |
GE07bhg4c13u:976: yac ca puruṣa-sannidhānāc caitanyādhyāsāt tasyās tattvam ity āhus tan na |
GE07bhg4c13u:977: yat sannidhyadhasta-caitanyāt tasyāḥ kartṛtvaṃ tat tasyaiva sannihitasyeti suvacatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:978: na khalu tapāyaso dagdhṛtvam ayo-hetukam api tu vahni-hetukam eva dṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c13u:979: na ca calati jalaṃ phalati tarur itivaj jaḍāyās tasyās tattva-siddhir jalādiṣv antaryāmy-adhiṣṭhitatveneṣṭāsiddher vidhāyaka-śruti-vyākopāc caited evam |
GE07bhg4c13u:980: na hi jaḍa-prakṛtim uddiśya svargādi-phalakaṃ jyotiṣṭomādi-mokṣa-phalakaṃ dhyānaṃ ca smṛtir vidhatte 'pi tu cetanam eva bhoktāram uddiśyeti puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:981_0: tac ca prakṛter iti yad uktaṃ tat tu tad-vṛtti-prācuryād eva yathā kareṇa bibhrati
GE07bhg4c13u:981_1: puruṣe karo bibhartīti vyapadeśas tathā prakṛtyā kurvati puruṣe prakṛtiḥ karotīti sa bhaved ity eke,
GE07bhg4c13u:983: na tu tair viyuktasya śuddhasyety ataḥ prakṛtes tad ity apare ||21|
GE07bhg4c13u:987: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:988: śrīdharaḥ : tad anena prakāreṇa prakṛty-avivekād eva puruṣasya saṃsāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:990: ity āśayena tasya svarūpam āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:991: asmin prakṛti-kārye dehe vartamāno 'pi puruṣaḥ paro bhinna eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:993: tatra hetavaḥ yasmād upadraṣṭā pṛthag-bhūta eva samīpe sthitvā draṣṭā sākṣīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:995: sākṣī cetāḥ kevalo nirguṇaś ca [GTU 2.96, Puruṣa-bodhinī] ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:996: tathā aiśvaryeṇa rūpeṇa bhartā vidhāyaka iti coktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:998: mahāṃś cāsau īśvaraś ca sa brahmādīnām api patir iti ca paramātmā vāntaryāmīti coktaḥ śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:999: tathā ca śrutiḥ eṣa sarveśvara evsa bhūtādhipatir loka-pālaḥ ity ādi ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1000: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ prakṛti-mithyā-tādātmyāt puruṣasya saṃsāro na svarūpeṇety uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1001: kīdṛśaṃ punas tasya svarūpaṃ yatra na sambhavati saṃsāraḥ ?
GE07bhg4c13u:1002: ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ tasya svarūpaṃ sākṣān nirdiśann āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1003: asmin prakṛti-pariṇāme dehe jīva-rūpeṇa vartamāno 'pi puruṣaḥ paraḥ prakṛti-guṇāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ paramārthato 'saṃsārī svena rūpeṇety artahḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1004: yata upadraṣṭā yatha ṛtvig-yajamāneṣu yajña-karma-vyāpṛteṣu tat-samīpastho 'nyaḥ svayam avyāpṛto yajña-vidyā-kuśalatvād ṛtvig-yajamāna-vyāpāra-guṇa-doṣāṇām īkṣitā,
GE07bhg4c13u:1005: tadvat kārya-karaṇa-vyāpāreṣu svayam avyāpṛto vilakṣaṇas teṣāṃ kārya-karaṇānāṃ sa-vyāparāṇāṃ samīpastho draṣṭā na tu kartā puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1006: sa yat tatra kiṃcit paśyaty ananvāg atas
GE07bhg4c13u:1007: tena bhavaty asaṅgo hy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ [BAU 4.3.15] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1009: deha-cakṣur-mano-buddhy-ātmāno draṣṭṛṣu madhye bāhyān dehādīn apekṣyātyavyavahito draṣṭātmā puruṣa upadraṣṭā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1010: upa-śabdasya sāmīpyārthatvāt tasya cāvyavadhāna-rūpasya pratyag-ātmany eva paryavasānāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1011: anumantā ca kārya-karaṇa-pravṛttiṣu svayam apravṛtto 'pi pravṛtta iva saṃnidhi-mātreṇa tad-anukūlatvād anumantā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1013: sva-vyāpāreṣu pravṛttān dehendriyādīn na nivārayati kadācid api tat-sākṣi-bhūtaḥ puruṣa ity anumantā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1014: sākṣī cetā [GTU 2.96, Puruṣa-bodhinī] iti śruteḥ | bhartā
GE07bhg4c13u:1015: bhartā dehendriya-mano-buddhīnāṃ saṃhatānāṃ caitanyābhāsa-viśiṣṭānāṃ sva-sattayā sphuraṇena ca dhārayitā poṣayitā ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1016: bhoktā buddheḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakān pratyayān svarūpa-caitanyena prakāśayatīti nirvikāra evopalabdhā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1017: maheśvaraḥ sarvātmatvāt svatantratvāc ca mahān īśvaraś ceti maheśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1018: paramātmā dehādi-buddhy-antānāṃ avidyayātmatvena kalpitānām paramaḥ prakṛṣṭa upadraṣṭṛtvādi-pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭa ātmā paramātmā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1019: ity anena śabdenāpi uktaḥ kathitaḥ śrutau |
GE07bhg4c13u:1020: ca-kārād upadraṣṭety-ādi-śabdair api sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1021: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ [Gītā 15.17] ity agre vakṣyate ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1022: viśvanāthaḥ : jīvātmānam uktvā paramātmānam āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1023: yadyapi anādi mat-paraṃ brahma ity ādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ity anena ca sāmānyataḥ paśeṣataś ca paramātmā prokta eva,
GE07bhg4c13u:1024: tad api tasya jīvātma-sāhityenāpi pṛthag eva spaṣṭatayā dehasthatva-jñāpanārtham iyam uktir jñeyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1025: asmin dehe paro 'nyaḥ puruṣo yo maheśvarḥ sa paramātmeti cāpy uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1026: paramātmeti ca nāmnāpy ukto bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1027: tatra parama-śabda ekātmavāda-pakṣe svāṃśa iti dyotanārtho jīvasya upa samīpe pṛthak-sthita eva draṣṭā sākṣī |
GE07bhg4c13u:1029: sākṣī cetāḥ kevalo nirguṇaś ca [GTU 2.96, Puruṣa-bodhinī] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1032: dehe sukhādibhokṭrayāvasthitaṃ jīvam uktvā niyantṛtayā tatrāvasthitam īśvaram āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1033: asmin dehe paro jīvād anyaḥ puruṣo 'sti yo maheśvaraḥ paramātmeti proktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1035: anumantānumati-dātā tad-anumatiṃ vinā jīvaḥ kiñcid api kartuṃ na kṣama ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1038: sarvataḥ pāṇi ity ādibhir uktasyāpīśasya jīvena saha sthitiṃ vaktuṃ punar uktiḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1041: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha |
GE07bhg4c13u:1043: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prakṛti-puruṣa-viveka-jñāninaṃ stauti ya evam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1044_0: evam upadraṣṭṛtvādi-rūpeṇa puruṣaṃ yo vetti prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha sukha-duḥkhādi-pariṇāmaiḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1044_1: sahitāṃ yo vetti sa puruṣaḥ sarvathā vidhim atilaṅghyeha vartamāno 'pi punar nābhijāyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1047: tad evaṃ sa ca yo yat prabhāvaś ca [Gītā 13.4] iti vyākhyātam idānīṃ yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute ity uktam upasaṃharati ya evam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1048_0: ya evam uktena prakāreṇa vetti puruṣam ayam aham asmīti sākṣātkaroti prakṛtiṃ cāvidyāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1048_1: guṇaiḥ sva-vikāraiḥ saha mithyā-bhūtām ātma-vidyayā bādhitāṃ vetti nivṛtte mamājñāna-tāt-kārye iti,
GE07bhg4c13u:1049: sa sarvathā prārabdha-karma-vaśād indravad vidhim atikramya vartamāno 'pi bhūyo na jāyate patite 'smin vidvac-charīre punar deha-grahaṇaṃ na karoti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1050: avidyāyāṃ vidyayā nāśitāyāṃ tat-kāryāsaṃbhavasya bahudhoktatvāt tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvārdhayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśāt [Vs 4.1.13] iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1051: api-śabdād vidhim anatikramya vartamānaḥ sva-vṛttastho bhūyo na jāyata iti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c13u:1057_0: evaṃ mad-ukta-vidhayā mitho viviktatayā yaḥ puruṣaṃ maheśvara-prakṛtiṃ ca jīvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c13u:1057_1: vetti ! sarvathā vyavahāra-samparkeṇa vartamāno 'pi bhūyo nābhijāyate dehānte vimucyata ity arthaḥ ||23 ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1060: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1064: ātmani deha eva ātmanā manasā evam ātmānaṃ kecit paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1068: eteṣāṃ ca dhyānādīnāṃ yathā-yogyaṃ krama-samuccaye saty api tat-tan-niṣṭhā-bhedābhiprāyeṇa vikalpoktiḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c13u:1069: madhusūdanaḥ : atrātma-darśane sādhana-vikalpā ime kathyante dhyāneneti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1070: iha hi caturvidhā janāḥ, kecid uttamāḥ kecin madhyamāḥ kecin mandāḥ kecin mandatarā iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1072_1: nididhyāsana-śabdenoditenātmani buddhau paśyanti sākṣātkurvanti ātmānaṃ pratyak-cetanam
GE07bhg4c13u:1073_0: madhyamānām ātma-jñāna-sādhanam āha -- anye madhyamāḥ sāṃkhyena yogena nididhyāsana-pūrva-bhāvinā
GE07bhg4c13u:1073_2: sarve mithyā-bhūtās tat-sākṣi-bhūto nityo vibhur nirvikāraḥ satyaḥ samasta-jaḍa-sambandha-śūnya
GE07bhg4c13u:1073_3: ātmāham ity evaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicāra-janyena cintanena paśyanti ātmānam ātmaniti vartate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1075_0: mandānām jñāna-sādhanam āha -- karma-yogeneśvarārpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇena phalābhisandhi-rahitena
GE07bhg4c13u:1075_1: tat-tad-varṇāśramocitena veda-vihitena karma-kalāpena cāpare mandāḥ paśyanti ātmānam ātmaniti vartate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1077: viśvanāthaḥ : atra sādhana-vikalpam āha dhyāneti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:1079: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti [Gītā 18.55] ity agrimokter ātmani mansy ātmanā svayam eva na tv anyena kenāpy upakārekeṇety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1081: apare yogino yogenāṣṭāṅgena karma-yogena niṣkāma-karmaṇā ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1082: atra sāṅkhyāṣṭāṅga-yoga-niṣkāma-karma-yogāḥ paramātma-darśane parasparayaiva hetavo na tu sākṣād dhetavas teṣāṃ sāttvikatvāt paramātmanas tu guṇātītatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1083_0: kiṃ ca jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset [BhP 11.19.1] iti bhagavad-ukter jñānādi-sannyāsānantaram
GE07bhg4c13u:1083_1: eva bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] ity ukter jñānaṃ vimucya tayā bhaktyaiva paśyanti ||24 ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1084: baladevaḥ : maheśvarasya prāptau sādhana-vikalpān āha dhyāneneti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:1085: kecid viśuddha-cittā ātmani manasi sthitam ātmānaṃ maheśvaraṃ māṃ dhyānenopasarjanī-bhūta-jñānena paśyanti sākṣāt kurvanty ātmanā svayam eva,
GE07bhg4c13u:1092: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1094: śrīdharaḥ : ati-mandādhikāriṇāṃ nistāropāyam āha anya iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1095: anye tu sāṅkhya-yogādi-mārgeṇa evambhūtam upadraṣṭṛtvādi-lakṣaṇam ātmānam sākṣātkartum ajānanto 'nyebhya ācāryebhya upadeśataḥ śrutvā upāsante dhyāyanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1096: te 'pi ca śraddhayopadeśa-śravaṇa-parāyaṇāḥ santo mṛtyuṃ saṃsāraṃ śanair atitaranty eva ||25||
GE07bhg4c13u:1097: madhusūdanaḥ : mandatarāṇāṃ jñāna-sādhanam āha anya iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1100: eṣūpāyeṣv anyatareṇāpy evaṃ yathoktam ātmānam ajānanto 'nyebhyaḥ kāruṇikebhya ācāryebhyaḥ śrutvā “idam eva cintayata” ity uktā upāsate śraddadhānāḥ santaś cintayanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1101: te 'pi cātitaranty eva mṛtyum saṃsāram śruti-parāyaṇāḥ svayaṃ vicārāsamarthā api śraddadhānatayā gurūpadeśa-śravaṇa-mātra-parāyaṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1102: te 'pīty api-śabdādye svayaṃ vicāra-samarthās te mṛtyum atitarantīti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c13u:1105: anye tv evam īdṛśānupāyān ajānantaḥ śruti-parāyaṇās tat-tat-kathā-śravaṇādi-niṣṭhāḥ sāmpratikā anyebhyas tad-vaktṛbhyas tān upāyān śrutvā taṃ maheśvaram upāsate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1106: te 'pi cāt ta-saṅginaś ca krameṇa tān upalabhyānuṣṭhāya ca mṛtyum atitaranty eveti tat-kathā-śruti-mahimātiśayo darśitaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c13u:1112_0: atha karma-yogasya tṛtīya-caturtha-pañcameṣu prapañcitatvād dhyāna-yogasya ca ṣaṣṭhāṣṭhamayoḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1112_1: prapañcitatvād dhyānādeś ca sāṅkhya-viviktātma-viṣayatvāt sāṅkhyam eva prapañcayann
GE07bhg4c13u:1112_2: āha yāvad ity ādi yāvad adhyāyāntam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1113: yāvat kiñcit vastu-mātraṃ sattvam utpadyate tat sarvaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yogād aviveka-kṛta-tādātmyādhyāsād bhavatīti jānīhi ||26||
GE07bhg4c13u:1115: saṃsārasyāvidyakatvād vidyayā mokṣa upapadyata ity etasyārthasyāvadhāraṇāya saṃsāra-tan-nivartaka-jñānayoḥ prapañcaḥ kriyate yāvad adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1116: tatra kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasv [Gītā 13.21] ity etat prāg uktaṃ vivṛṇoti yāvad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1117_0: yāvat kim api sattvaṃ vastu saṃjāyate sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogād
GE07bhg4c13u:1117_1: avidyā-tat-kāryātmakaṃ jaḍam anirvacanīyaṃ sad-asattvaṃ dṛśya-jātaṃ kṣetraṃ tad-vilakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1117_3: kṣetrajñaṃ tayoḥ saṃyogo māyā-vaśā itaretarāviveka-nimitto mithyā-tādātmyādhyāsaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1118: tasmād eva saṃjāyate tat sarvaṃ kārya-jātam iti viddhi he bharatarṣabha |
GE07bhg4c13u:1120: saṃsāraḥ svarūpa-jñānād vinaṃṣṭum arhati svapnādivad ity abhiprāyaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c13u:1121: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam evārthaṃ prapañcayati yāvad adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1122: yāvad iti yat-pramāṇakaṃ nikṛṣṭam utkṛṣṭaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1125: athānādi-saṃyuktayoḥ prakṛti-jīvayor yogānusandhānāya tayoḥ saṃyogena sṛṣṭiṃ tāvad āha yāvad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1126: sthāvara-jaṅgamaṃ kiñcit sattvaṃ prāṇi-jātaṃ yāvad yat-pramāṇakam utkṛṣṭam apakṛṣṭaṃ ca sañjāyate tat kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogād viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:1127: kṣetreṇa prakṛtyā saha kṣetrajñayoḥ sambandhāj jānīhīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1128: īśvaraḥ prakṛti-jīvau niyamayan pravartayati, tau tu mithaḥ sambadhnīta |
GE07bhg4c13u:1133: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ||27||
GE07bhg4c13u:1135: aviveka-kṛtaṃ saṃsārodbhavam uktvā tan-nivṛttaye vivktātma-viṣayaṃ samyag-darśanam āha samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1136_0: sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakeṣu bhūteṣu nirviśeṣaṃ sad-rūpeṇa samaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1136_1: paramātmānaṃ yaḥ paśyati ataeva teṣu vinaśyatsv api avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva
GE07bhg4c13u:1138: evaṃ saṃsāram avidyātmakam uktvā tan nivartaka-vidyā-kathanāya ya evaṃ vetti puruṣam iti prāg uktaṃ vivṛṇoti samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1139_0: sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhavana-dharmakeṣu sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakeṣu prāṇiṣu aneka-vidha-janmādi-pariṇāma-śīlatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1139_1: guṇa-pradhāna-bhāvāpattyā ca viṣameṣu ataeva cañcaleṣu pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmino hi bhāvā
GE07bhg4c13u:1140_0: ata eva paraspara-bādhya-bādhaka-bhāvāpanneṣu evam api vinaśyatsu dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-svabhāveṣu
GE07bhg4c13u:1140_1: māyā-gandharva-nagarādi-prāyeṣu samaṃ sarvatraika-rūpaṃ pratideham ekaṃ janmādi-pariṇāma-śūnyatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1142: evaṃ sarva-prakāreṇa jaḍa-prapañca-vilakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ vivekena yaḥ śāstra-cakṣuṣā paśyati sa eva paśyaty ātmānaṃ jāgrad-bodhena svapna-bhramaṃ bādhamāna iva |
GE07bhg4c13u:1143: ajñas tu svapna-darśīva bhrāntyā viparītaṃ paśyan na paśyaty eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:1145: na hi rajjuṃ sarpatayā paśyan paśyatīti vyapadiśyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1147: evam-bhūtāny ānuparakta-śuddhātma-darśanāt tad-darśarnātmikāyā avidyāyā nivṛttis tatas tat-kārya-saṃsāra-nivṛttir ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1150_1: arthāt prāptam anyat kaṇṭhoktam iti vivekaḥ ||27 ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1151: viśvanāthaḥ : paramātmānaṃ tv evaṃ jānīyād ity āha samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1152: vinaśyatsv api deheṣu yaḥ paśyati, sa eva jñānīty arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c13u:1154: atha prakṛtau tat-saṃyukteṣu ca jīveṣu sthitam apīśvaraṃ tebhyo viviktaṃ paśyed ity āha samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1155_0: yas tv atattvavit prasaṅgī sarveṣu sthāvara-jaṅgama-dehavatsu bhūteṣu jīveṣu samam
GE07bhg4c13u:1155_1: ekarasaṃ yathā syāt tathā tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaraṃ vinaśyatsu tat-tad-deha-vimardena
GE07bhg4c13u:1155_2: vināśaṃ gacchatsu teṣv avinaśyantaṃ tad-vaikṣaṇaṃ paśyati sa eva paśyati tad-yāthātmya-darśī bhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1156: tathā ca vaividhya-vināśa-dharmibhyaḥ prakṛti-saṃyogibhyo jīvebhya aikarasyāvināśa-dharmā pareśo vivikta iti ||27||
GE07bhg4c13u:1159: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram |
GE07bhg4c13u:1160: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim ||28||
GE07bhg4c13u:1163: sarvatra bhūtamātre samaṃ samyag apracyuta-svarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ paramātmānaṃ paśyan |
GE07bhg4c13u:1164: hi yasmād ātmanā svenaivātmānaṃ na hinasti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1165: avidyayā sac-cid-ānanda-rūpam ātmānaṃ tiraskṛtya na vināśayati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1166: tataś ca parāṃ gatiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1167: yat tv evaṃ na paśyati sa hi dehātma-darśī dehena sahātmānaṃ hinasti | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c13u:1168: asūryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1169: tāṃs te pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātma-hano janāḥ || [ĪśaU 3] iti ||28|
GE07bhg4c13u:1170: madhusūdanaḥ : tad etad ātma-darśanaṃ phalena stauti rucy-utpattaye samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1173: evaṃ pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇam ātmānaṃ paśyann ayam aham asmīti śāstra-dṛṣṭyā sākṣātkurvan na hinasty ātmanātmānam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1174_0: sarvo hy ajñaḥ paramārtha-santam ekam akartr-abhoktṛ-paramānanda-rūpam ātmānam avidyayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1174_1: sati bhāty api vastuni nāsti na bhātīti pratīti-janana-samarthayā svayam eva tiraskurvann
GE07bhg4c13u:1174_2: asantam iva karotīti hinasty eva tam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1175: tathāvidyayātmatvena paritgṛhītaṃ dehendriya-saṃghātam ātmānaṃ purātanaṃ hatvā navam ādatte karma-vaśād iti hinasty eva tam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1178: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1179: yo 'nyathā santam ātmānam anyathā pratipadyate || iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1181: asūryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1182: tāṃs te pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātma-hano janāḥ || [ĪśaU 3] iti
GE07bhg4c13u:1183: asūryā asurasya sva-bhūtā āsuryā saṃpadā bhogyā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1184: ātma-hana ity anātmany ātmābhimānina ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1185: ato ya ātmajñaḥ so 'nātmany ātmābhimānaṃ śuddhātma-darśanena bādhate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1186: ataḥ svarūpa-lābhāc ca hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c13u:1187: tata ātma-hananābhāvād avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāṃ muktim adhigacchatīty arthaḥ ||28|
GE07bhg4c13u:1188: viśvanāthaḥ : ātmanā manasā kupatha-gāminā ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ na hinasti nādhaḥ-pātayati ||28||
GE07bhg4c13u:1190: athokta-viṣayā tebhyo viviktam īśvaraṃ paśyan tad-darśana-mahimnā ca prakṛti-vikārebhyaḥ sva-vivekaṃ ca labhata ity āśayenāha samaṃ paśyan hīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1191_0: sarvatra bhūteṣu samaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ samyag-apracyuta-svarūpa-guṇatayāvasthitam
GE07bhg4c13u:1191_1: īśvaraṃ paśyann ātmānaṃ svam ātmanā prakṛti-vikāra-viveka-grāhiṇā viṣaya-rasa-gṛdhnunā
GE07bhg4c13u:1192: sa tad-rasa-viraktena tena parām utkṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ tad-vikārebhyaḥ svaiveka-khyātiṃ yāti ||28||
GE07bhg4c13u:1196: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati ||29||
GE07bhg4c13u:1198: nanu śubhāśubha-karma-kartṛtvena vaiṣamye dṛśyamāne katham ātmanaḥ samatvam ity āśaṅkyāha prakṛtyaiveti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1202: tathātmānaṃ cākartāraṃ dehābhimānenaiva ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na svataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1203: ity evaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati | nānya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1205_0: nanu śubhāśubha-karma-kartāraḥ pratidehaṃ bhinnā ātmano viṣamāś ca tat-tad-vicitra-phala-bhoktṛtveneti
GE07bhg4c13u:1205_1: kathaṃ sarva-bhūta-stham ekam ātmānaṃ samaṃ paśyan na hinasty ātmanātmānam ity uktam
GE07bhg4c13u:1206_0: karmāṇi vāṅ-manaḥ-kāyārabhyāṇi sarvaśaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ prakṛtyaiva dehendriya-saṅghātākāra-pariṇatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1206_1: sarva-vikāra-kāraṇa-bhūtayā triguṇātmikayā bhagavan-māyayaiva kriyamāṇāni na tu puruṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c13u:1207: evaṃ kṣetreṇa kriyamāṇeṣv api karmasu ātmānaṃ kṣetrajñam akartāraṃ sarvopādhi-vivarjitam asaṅgam ekaṃ sarvatra samaṃ yaḥ paśyati,
GE07bhg4c13u:1211: bhede 'pi vaiṣamye 'pi na nirviśeṣasyākartur ākāśasyeva na bhede pramāṇaṃ kiṃcid ātmana ity upapāditaṃ prāk ||29||
GE07bhg4c13u:1213: prakṛtyaiva dehendriyādyākāreṇa pariṇatayā sarvaśaḥ sarvāṇy ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ dehābhimānenaiva ātmanaḥ kartṛtvam, na tu svataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1216: prakṛteḥ sva-vivekaṃ kathaṃ yātīty apekṣāyāṃ tatra prakāram āha - prakṛtyaiveti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:1217: yaḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi prakṛtyaiva cān mad-adhiṣṭhitayeśvara-preritayā kriyamāṇāni paśyati,

GE07bhg4c13u:1258: ayaṃ tu paramātmā anādi nirguṇaś ca |

GE07bhg4c13u:1263: ātmanaḥ svato 'kartṛtve 'pi śarīra-sambandhopādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ syād ity āśaṅkām apanudan yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyatīty etad vivṛṇoti anādirvād iti |

GE07bhg4c13u:1265: tatra vyayo dvedhā dharmi-svarūpasyaivotpattimattayā vā dharmi-svarūpasyānutpādyatve 'pi dharmāṇām evotpatty-ādimattayā vā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1268: sā ca nāsti sarvadā sata ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1271: tad-abhāve ca tad-uttara-bhāvino bhāva-vikārā na sambhavanty eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:1275: na hi dharmiṇam avikṛtya kaścid dharma upaity apaiti vā dharma-dharmiṇos tādātmyād ayaṃ tu nirdharmako 'to na dharma-dvārāpi vyetīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1276: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā [BAU 4.5.14] iti śruteḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:1279: yato na lipyate na tv ayam akartṛtvād ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:1281: prakṛtyaiva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇānīti māyā-kāryatva-vyapadeśāc ca |

GE07bhg4c13u:1288: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu ity uktam |

GE07bhg4c13u:1290: kuta ity ata āha anāditvād iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1291: na vidyate ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yataḥ sa anādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1292: yathā pañcamy-anta-padārthenānuttama-śabdena paramottama ucyate tathaiva anādi-śabdena parama-kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1293: tataś cānāditvāt parama-kāraṇatvāt nirguṇatvān nirgatā guṇaḥ sṛṣṭyādayo yatas tasya bhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāc ca jīvātmano vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ paramātmā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1295: śarīra-stho 'pi tad-dharmāgrahaṇāt na karoti jīvavat na kartā,
GE07bhg4c13u:1297: na ca lipyate śarīra-guṇa-liptaś ca na bhavati ||31||
GE07bhg4c13u:1299_0: nanu pareśam ātmānaṃ ca viviktaṃ paśyati kṛtārtho bhavatīty uktir ayuktā etebhya
GE07bhg4c13u:1299_1: eva bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānu vinaśyati na prety asaṃjñāsti iti jīvasya dehena
GE07bhg4c13u:1299_2: sahotpatti-vināśa-śravaṇād iti cet tatrāha anāditvād iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1300: ayam ātmā jīvaḥ śarīrastho 'py anāditvāt param-avyayo 'vyayatva-pradhāna-dharmatvād vināśa-śūnyo nirguṇatvād viśuddha-jñānānandatvān na yuddha-yajñādi-karma karoti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1307: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetuṃ sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1308: yathā sarva-gataṃ paṅkādiṣv api sthitam ākāśaṃ saukṣmyād asaṅgatvāt paṅkādibhir nopalipyate tathā sarvatra uttame madhyame adhame vā dehe 'vasthito 'pi ātmā nopalipyate ||32||
GE07bhg4c13u:1310: śarīra-stho 'pi tat-karmaṇā na lipyate svayam asaṅgatvād ity atra dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1311: saukṣmyād asaṅga-svabhāvatvād ākāśaṃ sarva-gatam api nopalipyate paṅkādibhir yatheti dṛṣṭāntārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1314: atha dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā sarvatra paṅkādiṣv api sthitam apy ākāśaṃ saukṣmyād asaṅgatvāt paṅkādibhir na lipyate,
GE07bhg4c13u:1315: tathaiva paramātmā daihikair guṇair doṣaiś ca na yujyata ity arthaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c13u:1316: baladevaḥ : nanu śarīre sthitas tad-dharmaiḥ kuto na lipyate ity atrāha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1317: yathā sarvatra paṅkādau gataṃ praviṣṭam apy ākāśaṃ saukṣmyāt tat-tad-dharmair na lipyate,
GE07bhg4c13u:1318: tathātmā jīvaḥ sarvatra deva-mānavādāv uccāvace dehe sthito 'pi tad-dharmair na lipyate saukṣmyād eva ||32||
GE07bhg4c13u:1321: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1322: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata ||33||
GE07bhg4c13u:1323: śrīdharaḥ : asaṅgatvāl lepo nāstīty ākāśa-dṛṣṭāntena darśitam |
